title: Lootex
description: Lootex 虛擬寶物拍賣場，是運用區塊鏈技術打造點對點的交易平台。在這裡你可以找到來自跨國際、跨領域、稀奇古怪的數位收藏品，並且不需擔心交易詐騙及跨境付款的問題。
description_en: Lootex is a virtual treasure auction house that uses blockchain technology to create a peer-to-peer trading platform. Here you can find digital collectibles from across the globe, across disciplines, and across the world, without worrying about fraudulent transactions or cross-border payments.

title: Oursong
description: OurSong 是一個基於區塊鏈技術的半中心化治理音樂共創平台。創作者們可以在這裡找到夥伴、共同創作、分享靈感、互相激勵並打造屬於你們的暢銷金曲。
description_en: OurSong is a blockchain-based, semi-centrally governed music co-creation platform. It's a place where creators can find partners, create together, share inspiration, inspire each other, and create their own best-selling songs.

title: Fansi
description: Fansi 是一個新型態的亞洲音樂 NFT 發行及聆聽體驗平台，透過 NFT 及特有的收藏體驗設計，讓音樂藝術家們能夠透過音樂 NFT 與粉絲們互動交流，更可以在平台上自由聆聽 Web3 音樂或加入收藏。
description_en: Fansi is a new type of Asian music NFT distribution and listening experience platform, through NFT and unique collection experience design, music artists can interact and communicate with fans through music NFT, and can freely listen to Web3 music or add collections on the platform.

title: Jcard
description: Jcard 從 NFT 平台出發，進階整合 OMO 互動、數位票券核銷功能、IP 聯名、卡片融合、3D 展示館等實際應用，提供更多 Web3 虛實體驗。
description_en: Jcard provides more Web3 virtual and real experiences by integrating OMO interaction, digital ticketing, IP co-branding, card fusion, 3D exhibition hall, and other practical applications from the NFT platform.

title: akaSwap
description: 致力於建置一個簡易、友善、公開、綠色的 NFT 交易平台，讓大家都可以輕鬆創作、交易、鑑賞、收藏、推廣來自全世界各種 NFT 有價資產。
description_en: We are committed to building an easy, friendly, open, and green NFT trading platform so that everyone can easily create, trade, appraise, collect, and promote all kinds of NFT valuable assets from all over the world.

title: Boxtradex
description: BOXTradEx 致力於建立一個安全並創新的 WEB3 元宇宙遊戲入口
description_en: BOXTradEx is committed to building a secure and innovative portal for WEB3 metaverse games

title: SOYL所有
description: 集策展、交易、媒體、管理功能於一的 NFT 平台，呈獻高水平作品與藏家個人化服務。
description_en: A NFT platform, which combines curatorial, trading, media, and management functions, presents high-quality works and personalized services for collectors.

title: PawnFi
description: Pawnfi 的使命是通過將 NFT 集成到 DeFi 中，為其創建更豐富的的基礎設施以擴展 Web3 世界。
description_en: Pawnfi's mission is to expand the Web3 world by integrating NFT into DeFi and creating a richer infrastructure for it.

title: Unibridge
description: UniBridge 平台提供以租代買的共享 NFT 模式，更有彈性交易 NFT 的同時，同時能大幅度增加市場流通性。
description_en: The UniBridge platform offers a rent-to-own NFT sharing model, which provides more flexibility to trade NFTs while significantly increasing market liquidity.

title: Highstreet
description: Highstreet 是一個以商業為中心，將購物、遊戲、NFT、傳統品牌和加密貨幣品牌與 MMORPG（大型多人在線角色扮演遊戲）遊戲體驗相結合的元宇宙平台。
description_en: Highstreet is a business-centric metaverse platform that combines shopping, gaming, NFT, legacy brands and cryptocurrency brands with the MMORPG (massively multiplayer online role-playing game) gaming experience.

title: Virsody
description: Virsody 旨在創造體驗最佳的虛擬策展平台，簡單操作、無需安裝，人人都能輕鬆打造高質感虛擬互動空間。
description_en: Virsody is designed to create the best virtual curatorial platform with simple operation and no installation, anyone can easily create a high-quality virtual interactive space.

title: Protoworld
description: Protoworld 是一個免費、開源和去中心化的元宇宙平台，允許用戶自由創建、共享和探索 3D 世界。
description_en: Protoworld is a free, open source and decentralized metaverse platform that allows users to freely create, share and explore 3D worlds.

title: Arcade
description: Arcade 是一個結合社群與 GameFi 元素的元宇宙，用戶可以操作自己的 NFT 進行各式活動（聊天互動、打造家園），在遊戲的過程中可以賺取代幣獎勵。
description_en: Arcade is a meta-universe that combines community and GameFi elements. Users can operate their NFTs for various activities (chatting and interacting, building a home) and earn coin rewards during the game.

title: Phanta Bear
briefly: 周杰倫旗下潮牌所發行
description: Phanta Bear 是由區塊鏈娛樂平台 EZEK 與流行歌王周杰倫所創辦潮牌 PHANTACi 共同合作發行。項目共發行 1 萬枚，持有者將能獲得實體禮物、受邀到私人 VR 俱樂部、參加數位演唱會計畫…等等。
description_en: Phanta Bear is a collaboration between EZEK, a blockchain entertainment platform, and PHANTACi, a hip brand founded by pop king Jay Chou. A total of 10,000 Phanta Bears will be issued and holders will receive physical gifts, invitations to private VR clubs, digital concert art, and more.

title: YOLO-Cat
description: 由藝人陳零九所發行的 NFT「YOLO Cat」共有 999 枚。持有者每週在群內會有一些語音聚會，包含陳零九會上來分享不管是在創業、加密貨幣、或是演藝上的經驗。
description_en: There are 999 NFT "YOLO Cat" issued by artist LingJiu Chen. Holders will have weekly voice gatherings in the group, including Zero Nine Chen who will come up to share his experiences in entrepreneurship, cryptocurrency, and performing arts.

title: Onion Meta
briefly: 百萬 Youtuber 洋蔥所發行
description: 台灣擁有超百萬訂閱的 Youtuber 洋蔥所發行。持有者可以加入以「創業、自媒體經營及 Youtube 經營」為主題打造的交流平台，會不定期邀請合作夥伴及各領域名人，分享相關知識，也會不定時邀約加密貨幣領域人士分享幣圈相關投資知識。
description_en: It is published by Youtuber Onion who has more than one million subscribers in Taiwan. Holders can join the exchange platform with the theme of "Entrepreneurship, Self - Media Management, and Youtube Management", where partners and domain leaders will be invited from time to time to share their knowledge and cryptocurrency-related investment knowledge.

title: HAMEN
description: 自封台灣大麻教父的歌手謝和弦，長期來一直力推 「大麻合法化」。2022 年 1 月中旬，他與剛戒麻出關的前知名電競職業選手 Toyz 吸菸的合照鑄成 NFT 系列 「路吸派」。
description_en: R-Chord, the Taiwanese singer who self-proclaimed to be the godfather of marijuana in Taiwan, has been pushing for the legalization of marijuana for a long time. In mid-January 2022, R-Chord turned a picture of him and Toyz (a former professional e-sports player who had just quit smoking marijuana) smoking into an NFT series "Road Smokers".

title: 師園鹽酥雞
briefly: 全球第一家 NFT 台式炸雞店
description: 坐落於師大夜市的師園鹹酥雞擁有超過 33 年的歷史，廣受消費者喜愛。2021 年底正式在 NFT 平台 Oursong 上開張、持有者可以兌換對應的實體餐點。
description_en: Located in Shida Night Market, SY Chicken has a history of over 33 years and is popular with consumers, and will be available on the NFT platform “Oursong” at the end of 2021, where holders can redeem the corresponding physical meal.

title: FOMO Dog
description: FOMO Dog Club 由兩位職業撲克玩家創立，致力於為全世界的華語人士提供服務。針對不同的賽道，舉辦各種主題的研討會、直播，討論近期交易。
description_en: Founded by two professional poker players, FOMO Dog Club is dedicated to serving the Chinese-speaking community around the world. For different circuits, it organizes seminars and live broadcasts on various topics to discuss recent deals.

title: GalaXY Kats
description: GalaXY Kats 是由 10,000 個獨特的狐獴 NFT 集合而成，由超過 190 種特徵隨機生成組合。從毛色、服飾到裝備等 NFT 皆被賦予不同的特殊功能。玩家可自由改變狐獴的外觀、能力，以及可施展的技能類型。
description_en: GalaXY Kats is a collection of 10,000 unique meerkat NFTs with over 190 randomly generated combinations. All NFTs, from fur color, and clothing to equipment, are given different unique functions. Players are free to change the appearance of the meerkat, its abilities, and the types of skills it can perform.

title: Demi-Human（已解散）
description: Demi-Human 部署在以太坊上，由 10,000 個獨特手繪 NFT 的組成。 每個 NFT 都是 500 多種不同特徵的獨特組合，包括頭髮、眼睛、衣服和配飾、具有許多實用功能。
description_en: Demi-Human is deployed on Ether and consists of 10,000 unique hand-drawn NFTs. Each NFT is a unique combination of more than 500 different features, including hair, eyes, clothing and accessories, with many useful functions.

title: ZombieClub
description: ZombieClub 一共有 6,666 個 PFP，旨在匯集群眾智慧成為一個去中心化智庫。透過持續產出不同的產品、體驗、平台，以探索 Web3 世界的發展。
description_en: With a total of 6,666 PFPs, ZombieClub aims to bring together the wisdom of the crowd to become a decentralized think tank. Explore the Web3 world by continuing to produce different products, experiences, and platforms!

title: AstroGator
description: AstroGator Fam 是部署在以太坊區塊鏈上的 4,000 個 ERC-721 NFT。每個 AstroGator 都由獨特的風格、皮膚、服裝和配飾組成，收集鱷魚成為家庭成員，將一起分享更多資訊和福利。
description_en: AstroGator Fam is 4,000 ERC-721 NFTs deployed on the Ether blockchain. each AstroGator consists of a unique style, skin, clothing, and accessories that collect crocodiles as family members who will share more information and benefits together.

title: ElysiumShell
description: Elysium System 成員多為台灣數位藝術家，團隊不僅有頂尖 3D 創作者、潮流繪師與平面設計師，更匯聚各行業菁英，期待透過 NFT 的力量，解放所有創作者的潛能，並偕同這股能量前進元宇宙。
description_en: Elysium System members are mostly Taiwanese digital artists. The team not only consists of top 3D creators, trend painters, and graphic designers, but also gathers the best of the best from all walks of life, looking forward to liberating the potentials of all creators through the power of NFT and advancing into the meta-universe together with this energy.

title: godpod
description: Godpod 以東西方古老神話為元素，創造各式各樣的 3D 小神明，希望建立「元宇宙的信仰系統服務」，藉著心靈療癒的交流課程等，打造高互動度的療癒互助社群。
description_en: Godpod creates all kinds of 3D deities based on ancient myths from the East and the West, hoping to establish a "meta - universe belief system service" and to create a highly interactive healing mutual aid community through spiritual healing exchange programs.

title: vocus and friends
description: vocus and Friends（VAF）是台灣創作平台方格子以實踐「創作有價」為核心理念而發行的原創 NFT 系列。
description_en: vocus and Friends (VAF) is an original NFT series released by the Taiwanese creative platform Square Grid with the core concept of "creativity has its price" in mind.

title: 八仙 8immortals
description: 《八仙 8immortals》NFT 是集「仙草影像」品牌多年來豐沛影視、音樂、設計、文化資源之前瞻實驗計畫，獲得五月天阿信、麻吉大哥等娛樂圈名人支持。
description_en: 8immortals NFT is a forward-looking experimental project that combines the abundant resources of film, television, music, design and culture of the "Immortals Images" brand over the years, and is supported by celebrities from the entertainment industry, such as Mayday's Shin and Big Brother Magee.

title: Dappie Gang
description: Dappie Gang 是由 6,666 個 Rabbit PFP 組成的 NFT 組合，這些 NFT 都具有 DeFi 實用性，尤其是造訪 Dappio、Solana Wonderland，可享費用折扣、獎勵放大和代幣空投。
description_en: Dappie Gang is a collection of 6,666 Rabbit PFPs that are NFTs with DeFi utility, especially for visits to Dappio, Solana Wonderland, with discounted fees, amplified rewards, and token airdrops.

title: THE REMADE
description: THE REMADE 是一個高級訂製鞋品牌，在 2022 年正式進入 WEB3 發展推出 500 個 1/1 的 E-DMAER GENSIS No.1 NFT，每 90 天會空投一個 RNFT (redeemable NFT) 可至官網兌換商品，發行至今已經兌換過六雙高級訂製鞋款，其中最新的鞋款 REVO 是一雙全 3D 打印的鞋子。
description_en: THE REMADE is a premium customized shoes brand, officially entering WEB3 development in 2022, launching 500 1/1 E-DMAER GENSIS No.1 NFT, every 90 days will be airdropped an RNFT (redeemable NFT) can be redeemed for merchandise on the official website, so far, it has been redeemed for six pairs of premium customized shoes, of which the newest model is the REVO. REVO is a fully 3D-printed shoe.

title: 比特宇宙Bitaverse
description: 比特宇宙Bitaverse，成立於2014年，致力於推廣順勢交易課程，和挖礦託管服務。2022年發行了第一檔比特宇宙的NFT-“Bitaverse”，銷售了6000於張，堅持每週直播，並每季給予持有者造血獎勵，和各種線上下線活動，目標成為連結幣圈和傳統投資圈的最佳橋樑。
description_en: Bitaverse, founded in 2014, is dedicated to promoting downtrend trading courses and mining hosting services. 2022 saw the release of the first Bitaverse NFT - "Bitaverse", which sold over 6,000 copies, with weekly live broadcasts, quarterly rewards for holders, and various online and offline activities. We are aiming to become the best bridge between the cryptocurrency circle and the traditional investment circle by providing weekly live broadcasts, quarterly rewards for holders, and a variety of online and offline activities.

title: Innocent Cats（久未更新）
description: （久未更新）該項目獲歌手潘瑋柏背書。官方表示無辜貓系列 NFT 可作俱樂部會員卡，未來可以解鎖和激活更多福利，並有機會獲得免費演唱會門票空投。
description_en: The project is endorsed by singer Will Pan. Officials say that the Innocent Cat NFT series can be used as a club membership card to unlock and activate more benefits in the future, as well as a chance to get free concert tickets airdrop.

title: Lion Heart（久未更新）
description: （久未更新）由藝人羅志祥親自擔任藝術總監的 LION HEART。官方表示該項目的第一階段是推出包含鞋子、精品、潮流玩物的特定稀有品項的 NFT 以及實體產品的合作、發行與販售；第二階段是推出 DeFi 的 P2P 質押複利商品；第三階段將規劃 GameFi、IP 投資包含影視音等。
description_en: LION HEART, with artist Show Lo as the artistic director, officially stated that the first phase of the project is to launch NFT of specific rare items including shoes, boutiques, and trendy toys, as well as the cooperation, distribution, and sales of physical products; the second phase is to launch DeFi's P2P Pledge Compound Profit Merchandise; and the third phase will be to plan for GameFi, and IP investment, including movies, videos, and audio, and so on.

group: 策略顧問 / 策展公司
title: Echox
description: EchoX 致力於協助各產業品牌，將線上線下的價值透過 Web3 的賦能應用與社群能量拉近與會員之間的距離，開啟全新的互動想像。
description_en: EchoX is dedicated to helping brands in various industries to bring their online and offline values closer to their members through Web3's empowering applications and community energy, opening up new interactive imaginations.

group: 策略顧問 / 策展公司
title: 創造智能
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/策略顧問-策展公司/創造智能.png
description: 成立於 2022 年，是三立 100% 投資的行銷科技公司，定位為「以內容為底蘊的科技公司」，主要服務有 CDP 顧客數據平台、NFT 發行營運、社群經營。
description_en: Founded in 2022, Create Intellgens Inc is a marketing technology company that SET invested fully, positioning itself as a "content-based technology company" with its main services being CDP customer data platform, NFT distribution and operation, and community management.

group: 策略顧問 / 策展公司
title: C-Cubed
description: C-Cubed 是一家專注於 Web3 項目的行銷顧問團隊。服務包括： 商業模式顧問討論、技術開發、NFT 發行、社區運營、行銷拓展，亦可以協助項目對接 LP 進行募資，一條龍式完成前進開拓藍海市場的 Web3 新商業模式。
description_en: C-Cubed is a team of marketing consultants specializing in Web3 projects. Their services include business model consulting, technology development, NFT distribution, community operation, and marketing development. We can also assist projects to raise funds with LPs and provide a one-stop-shop approach to develop new Web3 business models in the blue ocean market.

group: 策略顧問 / 策展公司
title: OneOffs
description: Oneoffs 是國際型的策展團隊，連續兩年於台北 W Hotel 舉辦橫跨藝術、區塊鏈、 VR 的 OneOffs NFT 國際藝術博覽會，締造了近十萬人次觀展熱潮。
description_en: Oneoffs is an international curatorial team that has held the OneOffs NFT International Art Fair across art, blockchain and VR at the W Hotel in Taipei for two consecutive years, creating a boom that attracted nearly 100,000 visitors to the fair.

group: 策略顧問 / 策展公司
title: Good People Consulting
description: Good People Consulting 是 web3 社群行銷及區塊鏈商業應用顧問公司，專注於協助企業客戶進入 web3 領域以及提供社群行銷的專業建議。
description_en: Good People Consulting is a web3 social marketing and blockchain business application consulting firm that specializes in helping enterprise clients enter the web3 space and providing expert advice on social marketing.

group: 策略顧問 / 策展公司
title: POMO Network
description: POMO Network 專門提供品牌發行 NFT、核銷賦能合約化等一站式服務。曾與美髮龍頭曼都、桃園永豐雲豹、燒肉霸主胡同...等企業合作。
description_en: POMO Network specializes in providing one-stop services such as brand distribution, NFT, and underwriting empowerment contracting. POMO Network has cooperated with such companies as Mentor Hair Salon, Taoyuan Leopards, Hutong Yakiniku, and many other companies.

group: 策略顧問 / 策展公司
title: Ctor Lab
description: Ctor Lab 是一個顧問團隊，為 Web3 和 NFT 項目提供廣泛的服務，包括安全審計、訂製開發、諮詢等。
description_en: Ctor Lab is an advising team providing a wide range of services for Web3 and NFT projects, including security audits, custom development, consulting, and more.

group: 策略顧問 / 策展公司
title: 奧果區塊顧問
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/策略顧問-策展公司/奧果區塊顧問.png
description: 奧果區塊顧問是一個私募基金、加密貨幣商業、法律、稅務、投資諮詢專業組成的聯盟，專注於為全球區塊鏈新創及值得信賴的客戶提供機構級解決方案。
description_en: Argo Group Consulting is a consortium of private equity, cryptocurrency business, legal, tax, and investment advisory professionals focused on providing institutional-level solutions to new and trusted clients in the global blockchain.

group: 策略顧問 / 策展公司
title: 閎旺科技
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/策略顧問-策展公司/閎旺科技.png
description: 閎旺科技是一家以協助 Web2 公司轉型進入 Web3 的顧問公司，專注於協助企業開發區塊鏈產品，包含NFT、加密貨幣、Defi 等，同時也擁有著許多年的智能合約開發經驗。
description_en: Hongwang Tech is a consulting company that helps Web2 companies transition into Web3, focusing on helping companies develop blockchain products, including NFT, cryptocurrency, Defi, etc. We also have many years of experience in smart contract development.

group: 策略顧問 / 策展公司
title: ReBorno
description: ReBorno 提供Web3 、區塊鏈、NFT、元宇宙相關項目服務，協助企業轉型邁向商務新藍海！
description_en: ReBorno provides Web3, blockchain, NFT, and metaverse-related project services to help enterprises transform into a new blue ocean of business!

group: 策略顧問 / 策展公司
title: Grenade 手榴彈
description: 手榴彈成立於 2019 年初，立志成為區塊鏈產業最活躍的公關行銷公司，提供區塊鏈相關一站式服務。
description_en: Founded in early 2019, Grenade aspires to be the most active PR marketing company in the blockchain industry, providing one-stop services related to blockchain.

group: 策略顧問 / 策展公司
title: The Z Institute
description: 創辦團隊從 2017 年起深耕區塊鏈領域，合作過的客戶包含Polygon, Opyn, QuickSwap, Tron 等知名 web3 公司，與經手總鎖倉量十億美金之 DeFi 項目資安審計，亦致力於區塊鏈人才培育，以四個月的線上培訓課程協助 web2 工程師轉職 web3 產業。
description_en: The team has been working in the blockchain field since 2017, and has worked with clients such as Polygon, Opyn, QuickSwap, Tron and other well-known web3 companies, as well as handling information security audits for DeFi projects with a total lock-up of $1 billion.

group: 策略顧問 / 策展公司
title: KPMG
description: KPMG 是一個全球性的專業諮詢服務組織，擁有跨領域、服務與國界的專家，在 144 個國家提供專業化的審計、稅務及顧問服務。
description_en: KPMG is a global professional advisory service organization with experts across disciplines, services, and national boundaries, providing specialized audit, tax, and consulting services in 144 countries.

group: 策略顧問 / 策展公司
title: 資誠 Pwc
description: PwC 是全球四大專業諮詢機構之一，專業人士分散於全球 157 個國家，在世界各地致力於提供高品質的審計、稅務及顧問諮詢服務。
description_en: PwC is one of the world's top four professional advisory firms, with professionals in 157 countries, dedicated to providing high-quality audit, tax, and advisory services around the world.

group: 策略顧問 / 策展公司
title: 明日科技法律事務所
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/策略顧問-策展公司/明日科技法律事務所.png
description: 明日科技法律事務所主要服務領域為國內外新興科技產業，包括新興數位商業模式、以及 AI 與 Blockchain 技術應用等方面。
description_en: Next & Nexus Law Office focuses on domestic and international emerging technology industries, including emerging digital business models, and AI and Blockchain technology applications.

group: 策略顧問 / 策展公司
title: 恆業法律事務所
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/策略顧問-策展公司/恆業法律事務所.png
description: 恆業法律事務所曾連續獲全球知名律師評鑒機構 Chambers Asia Pacific 評選為臺灣地區最佳之銀行金融、資本市場、公司與並購、爭端解決、勞工法之法律事務所之一。
description_en: Lin & Partners has been continuously ranked as one of the best law firms in Taiwan by Chambers Asia Pacific for banking and finance, capital markets, corporate and mergers and acquisitions, dispute resolution, and labor law by the world's leading law firms.

group: 策略顧問 / 策展公司
title: 尚澄法律事務所
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/策略顧問-策展公司/尚澄法律事務所.png
description: 尚澄法律，由蔡昆洲律師主持，是一間新型態的法律事務所，連續多年獲得 Legal 500 Asia-Pacific 評鑑為頂尖金融科技法律事務所之一，旨在解決跨境與前端法律與金融問題，期待以創新的方式提供高效和優質的服務。
description_en: Enlighten Law Group, chaired by Kun-Chu Tsai, is a new type of law firm that has been ranked as one of the top fintech law firms by the Legal 500 Asia-Pacific for many years, aiming to solve cross-border and front-end legal and financial issues and looking to provide efficient and quality services in an innovative way.

group: 策略顧問 / 策展公司
title: PANONY
description: PANONY是一家深耕加密和區塊鏈產業的孵化、投資、咨詢公司。PANONY擁有經驗豐富的行業老兵和業內頂尖專家組成的管理和咨詢團隊，致力於為企業賦能本土化市場認知，提供鏈接全球資源的專業路徑。服務客戶包括200多家區塊鏈初創公司，如 Highstreet、Render Network (RNDR)、Linear Finance、Polygon Network 等，覆蓋Web3.0和區塊鏈的所有領域；以及世界500強企業公司亞馬遜、上汽集團等，幫助大型企業開拓Web3.0業務思路。
description_en: PANONY is an incubation, investment, and consulting firm that focuses on the crypto and blockchain industries. With a management and consulting team of experienced industry veterans and top industry experts, PANONY is committed to empowering companies with localized market knowledge and providing a professional path to global resources. Our clients include more than 200 blockchain startups such as Highstreet, Render Network (RNDR), Linear Finance, Polygon Network, etc., covering all areas of Web3.0 and blockchain; as well as Fortune 500 companies such as Amazon and SAIC, helping large enterprises to develop Web3.0 business ideas. Web3.0 business ideas.

group: 策略顧問 / 策展公司
title: LeadBest Consulting Group
description:
LeadBest Consulting Group 是⼀個提供「數位賦能」的跨國顧問機構，運用「數位賦能」（包含敏捷、區塊鏈、資訊安全、雲端、AI、大數據等成熟軟體技術）替企業企業賦能數位力，扮演企業外部的數位長，替各產業打造連結未來世界的橋樑，客戶包含了新光鋼鐵、台灣賓士、裕隆汽車、和明紡織等上市櫃企業。

LeadBest 自 2018 年起持續深耕區塊鏈技術在各種領域的應用可能性，已成功協助汽車、地產私募基金、餐飲、電商等產業採用區塊鏈技術以解決現有的問題，這些年來獲獎無數，曾得經營類型獎項、行銷類型獎項，更在區塊鏈領域由前幾大公鏈 TRON 舉辦的黑客松、幣安 Binance 獎勵金比賽中獲得第五與分組第三名次。

title: Sui
description: Sui 是由 Mysten Labs 開發的 Layer1 公鏈，目標是提供一個高吞吐量、低延遲和低成本的區塊鏈網路，讓開發者能夠構建滿足 Web3 中下一個十億用戶的體驗。
description_en: Sui is a Layer1 public chain developed by Mysten Labs with the goal of providing a high-throughput, low-latency and low-cost blockchain network that enables developers to build experiences that meet the next billion users in Web3.

title: ThunderCore
description: ThunderCore 2018年正式成立，致力於區塊鏈技術研發及應用，並提供國內外企業互聯網及區塊鏈相關系統的設計、規劃等技術服務，以大規模共識機制打造快速、安全，高擴展性的區塊鏈，志在研發和推動Web 3.0。
description_en: ThunderCore was officially established in 2018, dedicated to the research and development of blockchain technology and its application, and provides technical services such as the design, the planning of Internet and blockchain-related systems for domestic and foreign enterprises, creating a fast, secure, and highly scalable blockchain with a large scale consensus mechanism, aiming to develop and promote Web 3.0.

title: LikeCoin
description: LikeCoin的藍圖是應用區塊鏈技術創造出全新創作生態系。創作者產出圖文內容，並在文中嵌入 LikeCoin 按鍵，註冊過後的讀者即可透過按讚，使創作者獲利，打造更完善的創作生態系。
description_en: The blueprint for LikeCoin is to create a new creative ecosystem using blockchain technology. The creator generates graphic content and embeds the LikeCoin button in the text, so that registered readers can profit from the creator by clicking on the Like button, creating a better creative ecosystem.

title: BTQ
description: BTQ 是由一群後量子密碼學家所組成的團隊。我們的使命是持續提供先進的量子安全科技，保障數位資產的長期安全性。
description_en: BTQ is a team of post-quantum cryptographers. Our mission is to continue to provide advanced quantum security technology to protect the long-term security of digital assets.

title: Numbers Protocol
description: Numbers Protocol 是基於區塊鏈技術的數位內容溯源解決方案，生態系包括公鏈 Numbers Mainnet，以及 Capture 數位資產管理平台服務 (Mobile App, API/SDK, Web App)，為創作者及用戶保存數位內容資訊完整性，為數位內容找回信任與價值。
description_en: Numbers Protocol is a digital content traceability solution based on blockchain technology. The ecosystem includes the public chain Numbers Mainnet and the Capture digital asset management platform services (Mobile App, API/SDK, Web App) to preserve the integrity of digital content information for creators and users to recover trust and value for digital content.

title: DIS CHAIN
description: DIS Chain 是一個創新的 PoW 公鏈，融合 MEME 文化與 AI，打造去中心化高效能區塊鏈生態系統。它提供豐富互動體驗，並結合傳統 PoW 挖礦與質押挖礦模式，增強網路交互潛力、穩定性和安全性。支持以太坊虛擬機，DIS Chain 建立強大生態系統，包括 DEX、DeFi、NFT、GameFi、SocialFi 及元宇宙。作為一個多元化 WEB3 生態系統，它為用戶開啟廣闊的可能性與探索空間。

title: 貝殼支付
description: 「貝殼支付」是由 SaltLab 推出的加密貨幣第三方支付通道，遵守法規且支援廠商新台幣出金，用戶可透過 Polygon 鏈上的 USDT、USDC、MATIC 消費，而無需負擔 Gas Fee。
description_en: Backer Pay is a cryptocurrency third-party payment channel launched by SaltLab, which complies with regulations and supports vendor deposits in NTD, allowing users to spend through USDT, USDC, and MATIC on the Polygon chain without the Gas Fee.

title: Baypay
description: BayPay 的目標是打造一個讓區塊鏈上的資產容易被發行與存取，並可以像現金一般使用的平台。藉由 Baypay 提供的雲端服務（票券發行、錢包服務、收銀機兌現等）來讓廣告業主、消費者與店家充分利用分散式帳本的優勢建立更好的獎勵回饋機制。
description_en: Bay Pay's goal is to create a platform where assets on the blockchain can be easily issued and accessed and can be used like cash. With Baypay's cloud-based services (voucher issuance, wallet services, cash register redemption, etc.), advertisers, consumers, and stores can take advantage of decentralized billing to create better reward mechanisms.

title: MaiPay
description: 加密貨幣支付解決方案 MaiPay 由 MaiCoin 集團推出，提供收銀系統服務商串接虛擬貨幣收付功能，電商平台可透過加密貨幣為商品定價、並向消費者收取代幣，擴大加密貨幣支付可行性。
description_en: MaiPay, a cryptocurrency payment solution launched by MaiCoin Team, provides cashier system providers with the ability to accept and pay in virtual currency, allowing e-commerce platforms to price products and collect tokens from consumers through cryptocurrency, expanding the viability of cryptocurrency payments.

title: PUNDIX
description: PUNDIX 致力於部署基於區塊鏈的銷售點 (POS) 解決方案，並鞏固與政府、支付公司和零售商的合作夥伴關係，共同實現快速增長。
description_en:
Founded in 2017, Pundi X delivers blockchain and AI solutions to build a more secure and inclusive world. Its flagship product, the XPOS, is a blockchain-based POS platform that enables brick-and-mortar stores to transact on the blockchain.

Headquartered in Singapore, Pundi X has also been selected as one of the top 50 Innovative Fintech Startups in 2018 by KPMG and H2 Ventures, cool vendors in blockchain business by Gartner, and one of the top 10 fintech leaders by Singapore Fintech Association in 2019.

For more information, please visit https://www.pundix.com.

title: GPUMINE
description: 創立於 2017 年底，目標提供礦工最有效率的體驗，不管是礦池、挖礦系統、礦場建置、挖礦優化都是公司的服務範圍。
description_en: Founded in late 2017, the company's goal is to provide the most efficient experience for miners, whether it's a mining pool, a mining system, a mining farm setup, or mining optimization.

title: Miner Source
description: 漫源科技提供專業的數位貨幣礦機組裝 / 教學、礦機託管、礦場規劃諮詢及數位貨幣專業課程等服務；推動數位貨幣普及化、不斷將 Mining 優化至最安全便利的模式，期許大眾能輕鬆掌握數位貨幣，進入區塊鏈的前瞻世界。
description_en: Miner Source Technology provides professional digital currency mining machine assembly/teaching, mining machine hosting, mine planning consultation and digital currency professional courses, etc. We promote the popularization of digital currency and continuously optimize Mining to the most secure and convenient mode, hoping that the public can easily master digital currency and enter the forward-looking world of blockchain.

title: Midas Labs
description: 成立於 2020 年，旨在提供高端 ASIC 晶片設計服務。秉持「去中心化的區塊鏈網路將會全面改變人類的日常生活」之理念，開發獨特具有之超級算力引擎。
description_en: Founded in 2020, the company aims to provide high-end ASIC chip design services. With the concept of "decentralized blockchain network will completely change human's daily life", they will develop a unique supercomputing engine.

title: Whalechip
description: 鯨鏈科技 ( WHALECHIP ) 提供完整的 ASIC 設計服務，能夠依據客戶的需求處理從架構/概念到製造的整體設計流程步驟。
description_en: WHALECHIP provides a complete ASIC design service that can handle the entire design flow steps from architecture/concept to manufacturing according to customers' needs.

title: Matters
description: Matters 是一個以分佈式網路為基礎、加密貨幣驅動的公共討論平台。所有在 Matters 上發佈的文章，皆會上載到星際文件系統（IPFS）的節點上，實現文章內容的分佈式存儲，完成將數據回歸創作者的第一步。
description_en: Matters is a distributed network-based, cryptocurrency-driven public discussion platform. All articles posted on Matters are uploaded to the nodes of the Interplanetary File System (IPFS), enabling distributed storage of article content and completing the first step of returning data to the creators.

title: MetaCRM
briefly: Web3 客戶關係管理方案
description: MetaCRM 旨在透過「一站式的 Web3 CRM 解決方案」來優化目前欠佳的 Web3 客戶體驗，並透過整合 Web2 及 Web3 的數據來為公司提供獨一無二的戰略洞見。
description_en: MetaCRM aims to optimize the current poor Web3 customer experience through a "one-stop Web3 CRM solution" and to provide companies with unique strategic insight by integrating Web2 and Web3 data.

title: Wagecan
description: 我們的使命是讓每位加密貨幣用戶的日常消費快速、簡單，沒有任何阻礙，致力於通過提供錢包和預付卡來解決數位資產薪資、交易和支付問題
description_en: Our mission is to make everyday spending fast, easy and hassle-free for every cryptocurrency user, dedicated to solving digital asset payroll, transactions, and payments by providing wallets and prepaid cards.

title: Contentos
description: Contentos 致力於構建⼀個去中⼼化的全球數位內容生態，實現內容⾃由生產、分發、交易並保障創作者權益，激勵內容創新及全球多元化，將價值和權利回歸至用⼾手中。
description_en: Contentos is committed to building a decentralized global digital content ecosystem that enables content to be produced, distributed, traded, and creators' rights protected, inspires content innovation and global diversity, and puts value and rights back into the hands of users.

title: 圖靈證書
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/區塊鏈應用/生活應用/圖靈證書.png
description: 圖靈鏈利用區塊鏈技術打造一站式數位履歷平台 - 圖靈證書。數位認證可減少時間與金錢成本，並增加安全性。目前圖靈證書已發行於國內外不同領域，讓區塊鏈應用更加多元。
description_en: Turing Certs leverages blockchain technology to create a one-stop digital resume platform - Turing Certificates. Digital authentication can reduce time and money costs and increase security. Turing Certificates have been issued in different fields both domestically and internationally, allowing for more diverse blockchain applications.

title: 度度客
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/區塊鏈應用/生活應用/度度客.png
description: 度度客致力於結合群眾力量及區塊鏈技術，讓資金流向透明化且專款專用，發揮社會影響力。這是探索區塊鏈應用在全球永續發展目標（SDGs）的一小步，相信隨著科技的進展，區塊鏈能為世界帶來更多無限的可能。
description_en: Dodoker is committed to combining the power of the crowd and blockchain technology to make the flow of funds transparent and dedicated to achieving social impact. This is a small step in exploring the application of blockchain to the Global Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), and we believe that with the advancement of technology, blockchain can bring more infinite possibilities to the world.

title: Demo3
description: Demo3 為 Web3 早期項目創辦人、開發人員和支持者提供開放的展示空間。
description_en: Demo3 provides an open showcase for early stage Web3 project founders, developers and supporters.

title: GUIDOOR
description: Guidoor 是款 Professional Network Manager 的應用程式，協助你管理工作中關鍵的人脈，聚集四散在其他 social/messaging apps 的 contact list，更加掌握自己的人脈資料，並透過 Web3 技術促進用戶之間的互助交流，最終達成「去中心化 LinkedIn」的願景。
description_en: Guidoor is a Professional Network Manager application that helps you manage your key contacts, gather contact lists from other social/messaging apps, gain more control over your network data, and facilitate mutual exchange among users through Web3 technology, ultimately achieving the vision of "decentralized LinkedIn".

title: SELF TOKEN（久未更新）
description: （久未更新）SELF TOKEN 結合 SELF ENTERTAINMENT 的娛樂實業，透過「故事」創造入口、「區塊鏈科技」作為協作工具，建立起可以共創價值與故事的沉浸式娛樂社群，並在現實的都市中留下屬於我們的「實景娛樂基地」，形成一個可以鏈接虛擬與現實的次世代娛樂生活型態。
description_en: SELF TOKEN combines SELF ENTERTAINMENT's entertainment industry to create a portal through "stories" and "blockchain technology" as a collaborative tool to build an immersive entertainment community where values and stories can be co-created, and to leave our "live entertainment base" in the real city, forming a next-generation entertainment lifestyle that can link virtual and real.

title: Protico
description: Protico 開發的工具讓用戶只要於裝置上安裝 Chrome 擴充應用後，就能在各種網站上透過加密貨幣錢包進行去中心化的跨網站聊天 (Web3 Chat)。
description_en: Protico has developed a tool that allows users to conduct decentralized cross-site chats (Web3 Chat) via cryptocurrency wallets on various websites by simply installing the Chrome extension on their devices.

title: STARBIT
description: STARBIT 專注於區塊鏈應用程式設計並投入底層鏈建置、證券型代幣 STO、NFT 平台與元宇宙的生態開發。
description_en: STARBIT specializes in blockchain application design and is involved in the development of the underlying chain, security-based token STO, NFT platform and metaverse ecosystem.

title: BSOS
description: BSOS (Blockchain for Supply chain Operation System) 專精於研發「企業區塊鏈」應用技術，協助企業接軌區塊鏈，探索全新商業價值。BSOS 為國際三大聯盟鏈 J.P. Morgan Quorum 台灣唯一官方技術大使及 R3 Corda 官方技術合作夥伴，其核心產品 BridgeX 已獲國內外大型金融機構及企業採用。
description_en: BSOS (Blockchain for Supply chain Operation System) specializes in developing "Enterprise Blockchain" application technology to help enterprises connect to blockchain and explore new business value. Its core product, BridgeX, has been adopted by large financial institutions and enterprises in Taiwan and abroad.

title: Snowbridge
description: 雪喬願景是成為銜接國際新創和台灣金融科技之「橋」，讓兩地產品與技術互通有無，加速新一代去中心化應用落地實現。
description_en: Snowbridge's vision is to become the "bridge" between international innovation and Taiwan's financial technology, enabling the exchange of products and technologies between the two places and accelerating the implementation of next-generation decentralized applications.

title: Croxlink
description: 合流科技是一間專注於企業供應鏈整合服務的公司。運用區塊鏈的技術，促使上、中、下游的供應商連結成高隱私、高效能、高安全的價值體系，資訊能被即時驗證、被追溯並且無法篡改。
description_en: Croxlink is a company focused on enterprise supply chain integration services. Using blockchain technology, it enables upstream, midstream, and downstream suppliers to connect into a high-privacy, high-performance, and high-security value system, where information can be verified, traced, and tampered with in real time.

title: Spiderweb
description: Spiderweb 旨在打造基於去中心化區塊鏈雲端網路服務 (DIDC)的高效能、安全區塊鏈，為下一代 Web3 去中心化應用程式提供一站式、低度代碼開發、無痛遷移的創製環境。
description_en: Spiderweb aims to build a high-performance, secure blockchain based on the Decentralized Blockchain cloud (DIDC) service, providing a one-stop, low-code development, painless migration creation environment for the next generation of Web3 decentralized applications.

title: Bitmark
description: Bitmark 旨在重建對數據的信任。我們的端到端網際網路協定可確保數據的來源，不需要可信的第三方就能有可驗證的資訊、數位產權和安全共享的個人數據。 加州大學柏克萊分校、輝瑞公司和 KKBOX 等合作夥伴將 Bitmark 技術應用於醫療保健、音樂、藝術等領域。
description_en: Bitmark is designed to rebuild trust in data. Our end-to-end Internet protocol ensures the provenance of data without the need for trusted third parties to have verifiable information, digital property rights, and securely shared personal data. Partners such as the University of California, Berkeley, Pfizer, and KKBOX are applying Bitmark technology to healthcare, music, art, and more.

title: ITM
description: ITM 國際信任機器股份有限公司成立於 2019 年 1 月，提供區塊鏈擴容解決方案（Blockchain Scaling Solutions）及區塊鏈 IC整合技術（Blockchain-enabled IC）。
description_en: Established in January 2019, ITM International Trusted Machine Co., Ltd. provides Blockchain Scaling Solutions and Blockchain-enabled IC technology.

title: 奧丁丁區塊鏈
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/區塊鏈應用/解決方案/奧丁丁區塊鏈.png
description: OwlTing Blockchain Services 應用區塊鏈技術，建立更安全透明的商務流程，產出更值得客戶信賴的商品，打造具有高度信服力的商業服務
description_en: OwlTing Blockchain Services uses blockchain technology to build a more secure and transparent business process, produce more trustworthy products and create a highly reliable business service.

title: Pelith
description: Pelith 於 2018 創立，團隊成員都是生於技術社群的早期開發者與研究員，目標是在『真的』區塊鏈上做『有用』的產品。提供全方位區塊鏈技術解決方案與顧問服務，協助企業教育訓練與導入區塊鏈。
description_en: Founded in 2018, Pelith is a team of early developers and researchers born in the technology community with the goal of making 'useful' products on the 'real' blockchain. We provide a full range of blockchain technology solutions and consulting services to help companies educate and train on blockchain adoption.

title: Alphalytics
description: Alphalytics 成立於 2021 年末，致力於為亞洲最好的 OnChain Data 鏈上數據分析平台，透過獨有的標籤技術，掌握鏈上數據即時的變化。
description_en: Founded in late 2021, Alphalytics is dedicated to being Asia's best OnChain Data on-chain data analytics platform, capturing real-time changes in on-chain data through its unique tagging technology.

title: Fio protocol
description: FIO 協議通過將所有公共錢包地址替換為單個、安全、可自定義的加密入口，可以像發送電子郵件一樣輕鬆地發送、接收或請求任何類型的加密貨幣。
description_en: The FIO protocol makes it as easy to send, receive, or request any type of cryptocurrency as it is to send email by replacing all public wallet addresses with a single, secure, customizable encryption portal.

title: 0xAvenue
description: 0xAvenue 是一家 Web3 零售和實體製作公司，其使命是幫助品牌和創作者在支持 Web3 的未來發展壯大；為消費者、粉絲和社區創造獨特而引人入勝的消費體驗。
description_en: 0xAvenue is a Web3 retail and physical production company whose mission is to help brands and creators thrive in supporting the future of Web3; creating unique and engaging consumer experiences for consumers, fans and communities.

title: Poseidon Network
description: POSEIDON NETWORK 產品定位是多中心化的 CDN 結合分散式儲存，旨在透過區塊鏈科技，搭配強而有力的 IoT Device ，以及合理的通證經濟解決 CDN 的問題。
description_en: POSEIDON NETWORK is positioned as a polycentric CDN combined with decentralized storage, aiming to solve the CDN problem through blockchain technology, powerful IoT Device, and reasonable pass economy.

title: 國泰金控數數發中心
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/區塊鏈應用/解決方案/國泰金控數數發中心.png
description: 爲積極投入金融科技創新應用領域、推動集團數位轉型。國泰金控設立數位數據暨科技發展中心（數數發中心），以數據驅動為理念，結合子公司的力量與基礎，協助打造數位數據生態圈。
description_en: In order to actively invest in the innovative application of financial technology and promote the Group's digital transformation. Cathay Financial established the Digital Data and Technology Development Center (DDC) to help build a digital data ecosystem by combining the strength and foundation of its subsidiaries with the concept of data drive.

title: CTBC Blockchain Marketplace
description: 中國信託持續協助企業實踐創新，提供的區塊鏈解決方案應用在解決：供應鏈、電商零售、醫療健康、客製化服務..等領域，加入改變產業的創新生態。
description_en: CTBC Blockchain Marketplace continues to help companies innovate by providing blockchain solutions in areas such as supply chain, e-commerce retail, healthcare, customized services... Chinatrust has joined the new generation of industry-changing innovations.

title: TonDaddy
description: 使用 TonDaddy，用戶可以輕鬆追蹤.ton域名的當前交易量，並可獲得即時的平均 DNS 域名價格和數量，來進行趨勢分析。
description_en: With TonDaddy, users can easily track the current transaction amount of the domains with Ton and get real-time average DNS domain price and volume for trend analysis.

title: TonRun
description: 一站式瀏覽所有 TON 區塊鏈網路已開發的應用程式。
description_en: One-stop access to all developed applications for the TON blockchain network.

title: SupraOracles
description: 連接真實世界數據以簡化和保護金融市場的智能合約服務。
description_en: Smart contract service that connects to real-world data to simplify and protect financial markets.

title: RE:DREAMER Lab
description: RE:DREAMER 致力打造關鍵的「NFT兌換協議層」，旨在將鏈上記錄與鏈下現實生活資產和體驗聯繫起來，以更快速的將線上下的產品整合與串聯，讓數位生活直接接口至現實世界中。
description_en: RE:DREAMER strives to build a key "NFT exchange protocol layer", aiming to link up-chain records with off-chain real-life assets and experiences, in order to integrate and link up online and offline products more quickly, so that digital life can interface directly to the real world.

title: KryptoGo
description: KryptoGO 是進入 Crypto 世界的最好路徑，兩個主要的服務，『Compliance 反洗錢的合規 KYC 系統』、『Wallet as a Service 替企業打造最方便安全加密錢包』
description_en: KryptoGO is the best way to enter the world of Crypto, with two main services, "Compliance anti-money laundering KYC system" and "Wallet as a Service to create the most convenient and secure crypto wallet for businesses".

title: Capture
description: 提供包括 Mobile App, API/SDK, Web App 等工具，為創作者及用戶保存數位內容資訊完整性
description_en: Provides tools including Mobile App, API/SDK, Web App, etc. to preserve the integrity of digital content information for creators and users.

title: BiiLabs（久未更新）
description: （久未更新）BiiLabs 致力於使用分散式帳本技術解決物聯網帶來的挑戰，涵蓋智慧城市與能源管理等領域，其核心技術協助各產業之數位轉型，進而解決在客戶應用中的信任，安全，成長，效率等關鍵問題。
description_en: BiiLabs is dedicated to solving the challenges posed by the Internet of Things using decentralized billing technology, covering areas such as smart cities and energy management. Its core technologies assist in the digital transformation of industries to address the key issues of trust, security, growth, and efficiency in customer applications.

title: 秘銀（暫停營運)
description: （暫停營運）秘銀（MITH）旨在建立一個新的 Web3 生態系，用戶可以透過在社群軟體上的互動而獲得一定數量的秘銀幣，並將之用於投資或消費。
description_en: MITH aims to create a new Web3 ecosystem where users can earn a certain amount of secret silver coins through interactions on social software and use them for investment or spending.

title: Furucombo
description: Furucombo 是 DeFi 協議聚合平台，將不同 DeFi 項目的介面統一視覺化，讓用戶能像是在組樂高般，將不同協議納入個人策略組合，輕鬆操作並取得更高的獲利。
description_en: Furucombo is a DeFi protocol aggregation platform that unifies the interface of different DeFi projects visually, allowing users to incorporate different protocols into their personal strategy portfolio as if they were forming a Lego set, making it easy to operate and achieve higher profitability.

title: Perpetual Protocol
description: Perpetual Protocol 為台灣的新創項目，是現今全球最大的 Defi 衍生品服務協議之一，首創永續合約專用的自動做市（AMM）智慧合約，提供流動性給虛擬貨幣衍生性金融市場。
description_en: Perpetual Protocol is a new venture in Taiwan and is now one of the largest Defi derivatives service agreements in the world, pioneering automated market making (AMM) smart contracts dedicated to sustainable contracts and providing liquidity to the virtual currency derivative financial market.

title: Zomma Protocol
description: Zomma Protocol 旨在成為所有鏈上金融產品的底層基礎，專注於 DeFi 期權的衍生產品。
description_en: Zomma Protocol is designed to be the underlying foundation for all financial products in the chain, with a focus on derivatives of DeFi options.

title: Orderly Network
description: Orderly Network 是一種去中心化的交易基礎設施協議，允許項目方構建 DeFi 應用程式，並為其帶來高吞吐量、低延遲、低費用、緊密的點差和可組合性。
description_en: Orderly Network is a decentralized trading infrastructure protocol that allows project parties to build DeFi applications and brings them high throughput, low latency, low cost, tight spreads and composability.

title: XY Finance
description: XY Finance 是一個去中心化的跨鏈聚合器，旨在以最優惠的價格為用戶提供高效的跨鏈交換服務、目前有 X Swap 和 Y Pool 兩個項目。
description_en: XY Finance is a decentralized cross-chain aggregator that aims to provide users with efficient cross-chain exchange services at the best price, currently with two projects, X Swap and Y Pool.

title: Hakka Finance
description: Hakka Finance 由多個 DeFi 應用程式組成，構成了一個包羅萬象的生態系統，並與平台原生貨幣 HAKKA 緊密集成在一起。
description_en: Hakka Finance consists of several DeFi applications that form an all-inclusive ecosystem and are tightly integrated with the platform's native currency, HAKKA.

title: TeaHouse Finance
description: Teahouse Finance 是一個 DeFi 資產管理平台，由智能合約驅動，致力於安全和靈活的資產管理。HighTable NFTs 持有人可以根據自己的風險承受能力從各種低、中、高風險策略中選擇。
description_en: Teahouse Finance is a DeFi asset management platform driven by smart contracts and dedicated to safe and flexible asset management. holders of HighTable NFTs can choose from a variety of low, medium, and high-risk strategies based on their risk tolerance.

title: Diamond Protocol
description: Diamond Protocol 旨在成為 DeFi 金庫和投資策略的「載體」。DeFi 投資員可以使用 Diamond 的工具、智能合約模板和用戶界面生成他們的投資策略，並可根據收費模式直接從金庫中賺取收入。
description_en: Diamond Protocol is designed to be the "carrier" for DeFi's vaults and investment strategies, allowing DeFi investors to use Diamond's tools, smart contract templates and user interface to generate their investment strategies and earn income directly from the vaults based on a fee model.

title: Bucket Protocol
description: Bucket Protocol 是 Sui 生態系上的抵押債務倉位(CDP)協議，透過抵押多種資產(如$SUI, $BTC, $ETH, staked SUI等等)以零息借出原生穩定幣($BUCK)。除了以超額抵押與即時清算機制優化生態上的資金利用率，Bucket Protocol 也提供閃電貸服務讓其使用者維護市場平衡。多樣化的收益池以及公開的元件接口更提高了協議的組合性、擴充性。
description_en: Bucket Protocol is a collateralized debt position (CDP) protocol on Sui's ecosystem that lends native stablecoins ($BUCK) at zero interest by pledging various assets ($SUI, $BTC, $ETH, staked SUI, etc.). In addition to optimizing ecological capital utilization with overcollateralization and real-time liquidation, Bucket Protocol also provides a lightning loan service for its users to maintain market equilibrium. Diversified revenue pools and open component interfaces enhance the protocol's combinability and scalability.

title: Scallop
description: Scallop 制定具有機構級品質、無縫可組合性和強大安全性的新生態系統標準，在 Sui 上建立下一代貨幣市場，還提供最貼近市場需求的借貸利率、AMM 和資產管理工具等許多其他服務。 在創辦人兼執行長 Kris 的帶領下，Scallop 團隊的努力使 Scallop 第一個實現 1.6 億美元歷史最高 TVL 的 DeFi 協議。
description_en: Scallop is one of the first DeFi agreements to be funded by Sui Foundation developers and is dedicated to building a user-friendly money market on Sui, offering high-yield Lending, low-fee Borrowing and high-quality bonds.

title: Solend
description: Solend 是 Solana 生態上最大的借貸協議，於 2023 年 4 月上線 V2 版本，新功能包括：受保護的抵押品、TWAP 預言機、流出率限制、抵押限額、無需許可的流動性挖礦...等。
description_en: Solend is the largest lending agreement on the Solana ecosystem and will be available in April 2023 in version V2. New features include: protected collateral, TWAP predictor, outflow rate limits, collateral limits, permissionless liquidity mining... etc.

title: Typus Finance
description: Typus Finance 是部署於 Sui 區塊鏈上的收益基礎設施，結合了掉期、借貸和衍生品協議，提供用戶一個選擇權市場。
description_en: Typus Finance is a revenue infrastructure deployed on the Sui blockchain that combines swaps, lending and derivatives agreements to provide users with an option market.

title: Cream Finance
description: C.R.E.A.M. Finance 是一種去中心化點對點 (P2P) DeFi 平台，提供借貸、交換、支付與數位資産代幣化等服務。
description_en: C.R.E.A.M. Finance is a decentralized peer-to-peer (P2P) DeFi platform that provides lending, exchange, payment and digital asset tokenization services.

title: TonStake
description: TonStake 致力於以最簡單的方式，讓用戶更容易加入 TON 區塊鏈、一同維護網路、獲得驗證獎勵。
description_en: TonStake is committed to making it easy for users to join the TON blockchain, maintain the network together, and earn verification rewards in the easiest way possible.

title: TonLend
description: TonLend 是基於 TON 區塊鏈的去中心化借貸平臺，旨在為 7 億 telegram 使用者提供安全、高效的借貸服務。
description_en: TonLend is a decentralized lending platform based on the TON blockchain, designed to provide secure and efficient lending services to 700 million telegram users.

title: Dappio
description: （停止營運）Dappio 是一個 DeFi /NFT 收益聚合器。除了包含傳統的代幣兌換（Swap）、收益挖礦（Farm）、借貸（Lend）、策略杠杆（Vault）等 Defi 功能外，Dappio 還支持針對 NFT 的質押收益操作。
description_en: Dappio is a DeFi /NFT revenue aggregator. In addition to the traditional Defi features such as Swap, Farm, Lend, and Vault, Dappio also supports pledged earnings operations for NFTs.

title: BitoPro
description: BitoPro 是由幣託集團於 2018 年推出，致力於推廣數位貨幣，為台灣用戶提供全方位的加密服務。期許能讓數位貨幣的交易更容易、使用更方便、應用更全面。
description_en: BitoPro was launched by the Coin Trust Group in 2018 and is dedicated to promoting digital currency and providing a full range of crypto services to Taiwan users. It is expected to make digital currency transactions easier, more convenient to use, and more comprehensive in application.

title: BITGIN
description: 台灣本土虛擬貨幣交易所，致力讓用戶以新台幣購買最貼近匯率的泰達幣、比特幣、以太幣，由凱基銀行信託保障新台幣資金。
description_en: Taiwan's local virtual currency exchange is committed to allowing users to purchase the closest exchange rate of TEDA, Bitcoin and Ether in NT dollars, with NT funds protected by KGI Bank Trust.

title: HOYA BIT
description: HOYA BIT 加密貨幣交易所於 2022 年成立，秉持著合法合規、直覺易用、穩健收益的理念，旨在提供友善投資者的加密貨幣交易服務。
description_en: Founded in 2022, HOYA BIT Cryptocurrency Exchange aims to provide investor-friendly cryptocurrency trading services with a philosophy of legal compliance, intuitive ease of use, and robust revenue.

title: MAX
description: MaiCoin 數位資產交易集團，成立於 2014 年，提供加密貨幣的交易服務，業務包含 MaiCoin 平台、AMIS 帳聯網公司、MAX 交易所、香港 MaiCapital。
description_en: MaiCoin Digital Asset Trading Group, founded in 2014, provides cryptocurrency trading services, including the MaiCoin platform, AMIS billing company, MAX Exchange, and MaiCapital Hong Kong.

title: MaiCoin
description: MaiCoin 數位資產交易集團，成立於 2014 年，提供加密貨幣的交易服務，業務包含 MaiCoin 平台、AMIS 帳聯網公司、MAX 交易所、香港 MaiCapital。
description_en: MaiCoin Digital Asset Trading Group, founded in 2014, provides cryptocurrency trading services, including the MaiCoin platform, AMIS billing company, MAX Exchange, and MaiCapital Hong Kong.

title: Rybit
description: Rybit 的目標是做一個讓廣大用戶省心、放心、安心的交易平台。期待透過多樣化的產業合作，為台灣的新一代打造一個創新、成長、有前瞻性的區塊鏈生態系統。
description_en: Rybit's goal is to be a trading platform that saves, reassures and gives peace of mind to all users. We look forward to creating an innovative, growing and forward-looking blockchain ecosystem for Taiwan's new generation through diverse industry partnerships.

title: XREX
description: XREX 是一家應區塊鏈技術而生的國際金融機構，與銀行、政府及用戶密切合作，共同改寫金融定義。提供企業級的服務，幫助位處發展中國家或與發展中國家有生意往來的中小型企業處理跨境金融服務，同時也為全球加密貨幣新手提供最友善的初始入口。
description_en: XREX is an international financial institution born out of blockchain technology, working closely with banks, governments and users to rewrite the definition of finance. It provides enterprise-level services to help small and medium-sized businesses in or doing business with developing countries handle cross-border financial services, while providing the friendliest initial entry point for newcomers to global cryptocurrency.

title: Ace Exchange
description: ACE 王牌虛擬貨幣交易所，提供新台幣購買虛擬貨幣，例如比特幣（BTC）、以太幣（ETH）、USDT（泰達幣）等主流幣種，24 小時隨時可以買賣，並與凱基銀行合作建構「新台幣資金信託保管」。
description_en: ACE is a leading virtual currency exchange, offering virtual currencies such as Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), USDT (TED) and other major currencies for 24-hour trading.

title: kikitrade
description: kikitrade 是個一站式社交型態的加密貨幣投資平台，為千禧世代、新手及專業投資者提供簡易和安全的加密貨幣投資體驗。
description_en: Kikitrade is a one-stop social cryptocurrency investment platform that provides an easy and secure cryptocurrency investment experience for millennials, novices, and professional investors.

title: Pionex
description: 派網（Pionex）以提供多種量化交易機器人服務而聞名，提供網格交易、定投策略、追蹤止盈、無限網格、期現套利...等多種量化策略。
description_en: Pionex is known for providing a wide range of quantitative trading robots, including grid trading, fixed investment strategies, trailing profit taking, infinite grid, cash and futures arbitrage... Pionex offers a wide range of quantitative strategies.

title: BitShine
description: BitShine 希望降低加密貨幣參與門檻，以直覺好上手的介面，給使用者良好的投資體驗，目標打造人人皆持有加密貨幣的世界！​
description_en: BitShine wants to lower the threshold for cryptocurrency participation and give users a good investment experience with an intuitive interface, with the goal of creating a world where everyone owns cryptocurrency!

title: BitYacht 彼雅特科技
description: BitYacht是由傳統金融業背景出身的團隊所組成，核心成員備行業防洗錢專業資格與基金管理資格，除了多年的金融行業經驗以外，亦具備加密技術與資安數據行業等投資與經營之實務經驗，期望推廣區塊鏈金融進入一般普羅大眾的投資領域。
description_en: BitYacht is comprised of a team with a traditional financial industry background. The core members hold professional qualifications in anti-money laundering and fund management within the industry. In addition to many years of experience in the financial sector, they also possess practical experience in investment and management within the fields of cryptography, cybersecurity, and data analytics. Their goal is to promote blockchain finance and make it accessible to the general public as an investment option.

title: Crypto Arsenal
description: Crypto-Arsenal 致力於建構開放式加密貨幣量化程式交易平台，打造新一代智能交易機器人開發、串接、媒合與自動跟投的雲端服務，對接各大加密貨幣交易所（CEX ＆ DEX），支援雲端或本地端策略開發環境、即時回測、實時模擬與實盤交易...等資料。
description_en: Crypto-Arsenal is committed to building an open cryptocurrency quantitative program trading platform, creating a new generation of intelligent trading robot development, streaming, matching and auto-following cloud services, connecting to major cryptocurrency exchanges (CEX & DEX), supporting cloud or local end strategy development environment, real-time backtesting, real-time simulation, live trading, and other information.

title: Quantrend
description: 量趨科技由專業的 AI 深度學習工程師與量化交易團隊組成，策略類型包含高頻交易、高頻造市商以及中低頻方向性策略等，旨在為投資者提供可靠的加密貨幣資產增長解決方案。
description_en: Quantrend Technology is composed of professional AI deep learning engineers and a quantitative trading team. The strategy types include high-frequency trading, high-frequency market making, and low to medium-frequency directional strategies, aiming to provide investors with reliable solutions for cryptocurrency asset growth.

title: Kronos Research
description: Kronos Research 是知名的加密貨幣量化交易團隊，憑藉團隊過去於紐約華爾街、芝加哥量化對沖基金巨頭 Citadel 的工作經驗，以及結合人工智慧、機器學習推出的高頻交易策略，讓 Kronos 在短短兩年內便登上各大加密貨幣交易所的交易量排行榜，更創下「單日百億美金交易量」的優秀成績。
description_en: Kronos Research is a well-known cryptocurrency quantitative trading team. With the team's past experience in New York Wall Street and Chicago quantitative hedge fund giant Citadel, and the high-frequency trading strategies combined with artificial intelligence and machine learning, Kronos has made its way to the top of the trading volume charts of major cryptocurrency exchanges in just two years and even achieved the outstanding result of "$10 billion trading volume in a single day".

title: DeFITs
description: DeFITs 是一家交易科技公司，旨在為我們的客戶提供全方位的加密投資服務，讓他們無痛參與區塊鏈生態的金融創新，同時也是整個系統的流動性提供者。
description_en: DeFITs is a trading technology company that aims to provide a full range of crypto investment services to our clients, allowing them to painlessly participate in the financial innovation of the blockchain ecosystem, as well as being the liquidity provider for the entire system.

title: SuDo
description: SuDo Research Labs（蘇度科技有限公司）源於一群區塊鏈（Blockchain）研究室成員在 2017 年創設的 SuDo Research，成員群共同研發之低風險（市場中性）量化交易策略已取得卓越的成果
description_en: SuDo Research Labs was founded in 2017 by a group of Blockchain research lab members who have been working together to develop low-risk (market-neutral) quantitative trading strategies with excellent results.

title: Bincentive
description: Bincentive 是加密資產投資服務平台，透過媒合交易專家與個人投資者，連接頂尖投資能力與不同風險的投資需求，提供最專業多樣的量化投資策略選擇。
description_en: Bincentive is a crypto asset investment service platform that provides the most professional and diversified quantitative investment strategy options by matching trading experts with individual investors, connecting top-tier investment capabilities with different risk investment needs.

title: FULY.AI
description: FULY.AI 是專為 「Bitfinex 保證金融資交易」設計的「複利 AI 投資策略機器人」，幫助用戶以即時利率自動放款，24小時收息不中斷！
description_en: FULY.AI is a "compounding AI investment strategy robot" designed for "Bitfinex Guaranteed Financial Trading", which helps users to automatically lend money at real-time interest rates and collect interest 24 hours a day without interruption!

title: WINCAN Digital Assets
description: WINCAN 穩健數位資產管理由執行長徐崇寶帶領,團隊擁有豐富運營經驗與金融背景,提供最完善的加密貨幣錢包致力於發展優質的數位資產投資機會。也是數位資產管理界唯一的金融團隊，以最傳統可靠的金融堅持，做最先進的數位資產管理。
description_en: WINCAN is the only financial team in the digital asset management industry. Our team is made up of professionals with financial backgrounds, and we are committed to the most advanced digital asset management with the most traditional and reliable financial insistence.

title: Amber Group
description: Amber Group 成立於 2017 年，是最早面向全球大型機構和家族基金並成功提供一站式數位資產服務的先驅者之一。作為一家綜合的加密金融服務提供商，幫助客戶獲得流動性，賺取收益並管理各種加密資產的風險。 目標通過提供投資靈活性和最大化回報來優化長期價值。
description_en: Founded in 2017, Amber Group was one of the first pioneers to offer a successful one-stop shop for digital assets to large institutional and family funds around the world. As an integrated crypto financial services provider, it helps clients gain liquidity, earn income and manage risk across a wide range of crypto assets. The goal is to optimize long-term value by providing investment flexibility and maximizing returns.

title: Coinomo(久未更新)
description: （久未更新）Coinomo 提供代幣交易和精選 DeFi & CeFi 產品等加密投資，提供用戶一站式投資平台、簡化了購買 DeFi 的複雜流程。
description_en: Coinomo offers crypto investments such as token trading and selected DeFi & CeFi products, providing users with a one-stop investment platform and simplifying the complex process of buying DeFi.

title: 優利理財(久未更新)
description: （久未更新）提供新時代投資人，有趣好懂的理財思維+佛系理財規劃工具，協助理財新手達到短中長期的財務目標，過上理想生活。
description_en: Nicelend provides a new era of investors, interesting and understandable financial thinking + Buddhist financial planning tools to help financial novices achieve short-, medium- and long-term financial goals and lead an ideal life.

title: Steaker（暫停營運）
description: （暫停營運）Steaker 為全球數位資產管理平台。善用區塊鏈技術及專業風險管控知識協助客戶創造數位資產的被動收益，累積個人的鏈上財富。
description_en: Steaker is a global digital asset management platform. It uses blockchain technology and professional risk management knowledge to help clients create passive income from digital assets and accumulate personal wealth on the chain.

group: 錢包 / 安全方案-區塊鏈安全方案
title: AMIS
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/錢包-安全方案/區塊鏈安全方案/amis.png
description: AMIS 為一區塊鏈底層技術的公司成立於 2016 年，是 MaiCoin 集團旗下姐妹公司，並且為企業以太坊聯盟的創始成員之一。2017年，JP Morgan的以太坊平台 - Quorum 宣佈其採用 AMIS 的伊斯坦堡拜占庭共識演算法。
description_en: AMIS, a blockchain-underpinning technology company founded in 2016, is a sister company of the MaiCoin Group and a founding member of the Enterprise Ethernet Consortium. 2017 saw JP Morgan's Ethereum platform, Quorum, announce its adoption of AMIS' Byzantine Consensus algorithm for Istanbul.

group: 錢包 / 安全方案-區塊鏈安全方案
title: Aegis Custody
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/錢包-安全方案/區塊鏈安全方案/aegis-custody.png
description: Aegis Custody 致力於推動資產數位化，並以所持有的信託牌照進行數位資產的保管、確保數位資產的安全性。
description_en: Aegis Custody is committed to the digitization of assets and the safekeeping and security of digital assets under its trust license.

group: 錢包 / 安全方案-區塊鏈安全方案
title: CYBAVO
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/錢包-安全方案/區塊鏈安全方案/cybavo.png
description: CYBAVO - 加密貨幣安全領域的專家：區塊鏈安全解決方案供應商，成員來自區塊鏈、加密貨幣、資訊安全等各領域專家組成，採用最高規格的安全標準，提供最完整的資產保護解決方案。
description_en: CYBAVO - experts in cryptocurrency security: blockchain security solutions provider, composed of experts from various fields of blockchain, cryptocurrency and information security, uses the highest standard of security and provides the most complete asset protection solutions.

group: 錢包 / 安全方案-區塊鏈安全方案
title: Chelpis
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/錢包-安全方案/區塊鏈安全方案/chelpis.png
description: CHELPIS 是一群勇敢創新、用心經營獲利與企業化經營的團隊，成員專精在安全技術、安全晶片、區塊鏈應用開發的新創團隊，技術深受各界肯定。
description_en: CHELPIS is a group of brave and innovative team, with the heart to operate profitably and entrepreneurially. The members specialize in security technology, security chip, and blockchain application development, making sure that the technology is well-recognized by all walks of life.

group: 錢包 / 安全方案-區塊鏈安全方案
title: 區塊科技
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/錢包-安全方案/區塊鏈安全方案/區塊科技.png
description: 區塊科技於 2018 年成立，致力整合資訊安全、數位證據保存及區塊鏈各領域的最新技術，建構出適用於各產業的數位證據保存與區塊鏈解決方案。
description_en: Founded in 2018, BlockChain Security is committed to integrating the latest technologies in information security, digital evidence preservation and blockchain to build digital evidence preservation and blockchain solutions for various industries.

group: 錢包 / 安全方案-區塊鏈安全方案
title: 趨勢科技
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/錢包-安全方案/區塊鏈安全方案/趨勢科技.png
description: 由趨勢科技打造的 ChainSafer，可以透過 AI 算法、以及網路安全數據庫，可主動檢測可疑活動並發出警報，加強用戶鏈上交易安全性。
description_en: ChainSafer, built by Trend Micro, can proactively detect suspicious activity and send alerts through AI algorithms and network security databases to enhance the security of users' on-chain transactions.

group: 錢包 / 安全方案-區塊鏈安全方案
title: BaaSid
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/錢包-安全方案/區塊鏈安全方案/baasid.png
description: BaaSid 將區塊鏈技術應用於保障資料的安全處理、儲存與使用以及身分驗證，希冀可以將區塊鏈技術落實到實際應用科技上。
description_en: BaaSid applies blockchain technology to secure the handling, storage and use of data and identity verification, with the hope that blockchain technology can be implemented into real-world technology applications.

group: 錢包 / 安全方案-區塊鏈安全方案
title: Chainsight
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/錢包-安全方案/區塊鏈安全方案/chainsight.png
description: Chainsight 是由人工智能驅動的資訊安全公司，開發出能夠即時偵測並預防加密貨幣、NFT、智能合約資安漏洞與詐騙的解決方案，能夠為所有與網路相關的科技公司與資安公司，提供區塊鏈資安漏洞與詐騙的防護，包含常見的惡意地址、智能合約、dApp、假的加密貨幣&NFT、釣魚網站、社交媒體等詐騙。
description_en: Chainsight is an AI-powered information security company that has developed solutions to detect and prevent cryptocurrency, NFT, smart contract security vulnerabilities and fraud in real-time, providing protection against blockchain security vulnerabilities and fraud for all web-related technology and information security companies, including common malicious addresses, smart contracts, dApps, fake cryptocurrency & NFT, phishing sites, social media, and other frauds.

group: 錢包 / 安全方案-區塊鏈安全方案
title: ScaleBit
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/錢包-安全方案/區塊鏈安全方案/scalebit.png
description: ScaleBit 團隊由在學術界和企業界都有豐富經驗的安全專家組成，致力於為 Web3 Mass Adoption 提供安全解決方案。憑借在區塊鏈跨鏈和零知識證明等擴展技術方面的專業能力，ScaleBit 主要為 ZKP、Layer 2 和跨鏈應用提供細緻和尖端的安全審計。

group: 錢包 / 安全方案-加密貨幣錢包
title: Blocto
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/錢包-安全方案/加密貨幣錢包/blocto.png
description: 由台灣新創公司「門戶科技 Portto」所推出的跨鏈錢包，致力於改進區塊鏈應用的使用體驗，降低技術門檻與進入障礙，成為使用者進入去中心化世界的入口。
description_en: The cross-chain wallet launched by Portto, a Taiwan-based start-up, is dedicated to improving the experience of using blockchain applications, lowering the technical barriers and barriers to entry, and becoming a portal for users to enter the decentralized world.

group: 錢包 / 安全方案-加密貨幣錢包
title: CoolBitX
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/錢包-安全方案/加密貨幣錢包/coolbitx.png
description: 庫幣科技成立於 2014 年，是一家台灣金融科技公司，專門製造安全的加密貨幣冷錢包，為數百萬用戶開發智能合約平台。我們的設計師和工程師來自網路安全、學術界和硬體開發領域，致力於讓區塊鏈社區為日常用戶和交易者提供更好的環境。
description_en: Founded in 2014, CoolBitX is a Taiwanese financial technology company specializing in making secure cryptocurrency cold pockets and developing smart contract platforms for millions of users. Our designers and engineers come from the fields of cyber security, academia, and hardware development and are committed to making the blockchain community a better environment for everyday users and traders.

group: 錢包 / 安全方案-加密貨幣錢包
title: Qubic
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/錢包-安全方案/加密貨幣錢包/qubic.png
description: Qubic 錢包是 AMIS 帳聯網路科技公司為 NFT 打造的去中心化錢包，旨在降低消費者收藏 NFT 的門檻，簡單上手，用戶能在多個平台上透過信用卡輕鬆購買數位收藏品，不需要任何虛擬貨幣。
description_en: Qubic Wallet is a decentralized wallet for NFT created by AMIS Billing Network Technologies, Inc. to lower the threshold for consumers to collect NFT, making it easy for users to purchase digital collectibles via credit card on multiple platforms without any virtual currency.

group: 錢包 / 安全方案-加密貨幣錢包
title: SecuX
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/錢包-安全方案/加密貨幣錢包/secux.png
description: SecuX 是一家區塊鏈安全公司，提供先進的加密貨幣硬體錢包及加密貨幣支付解決方案，具備金庫等級的安全，擁有堅強的供應鏈管理及多功能的設計能力。
description_en: SecuX is a blockchain security company providing advanced cryptocurrency hardware wallet and cryptocurrency payment solutions with vault-level security, robust supply chain management and versatile design capabilities.

group: 錢包 / 安全方案-加密貨幣錢包
title: imtoken
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/錢包-安全方案/加密貨幣錢包/imtoken.png
description: imToken 是一家致力於讓每一個人都能夠平等、自由地享受數位生活的公司，致力於打造一款讓每一個使用者可以簡單易用、安全可靠的數位貨幣錢包。
description_en: imToken is a company dedicated to making digital life equally and freely accessible to everyone. imToken is committed to creating a digital money wallet that is easy to use, safe, and secure for every user.

group: 錢包 / 安全方案-加密貨幣錢包
title: BitoEX
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/錢包-安全方案/加密貨幣錢包/bitoex.png
description: 致力於推廣台灣數位貨幣，為提供顧客全方位的優質服務與品牌承諾而努力。提供 BTC、ETH、USDT 等加密貨幣購買與兌換。
description_en: Dedicated to promoting Taiwan's digital currency, BitoEX strives to provide its customers with a full range of quality services and brand promises. Provide BTC, ETH, USDT, and other cryptocurrency purchase and exchange.

group: 錢包 / 安全方案-加密貨幣錢包
title: TonKey
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/錢包-安全方案/加密貨幣錢包/tonkey.png
description: TonKey 是建立在 TON 區塊鏈上到多簽錢包。旨在幫助用戶安全高效地管理數位資產。
description_en: TonKey is built on the TON blockchain to multi-signature wallets. It is designed to help users manage their digital assets securely and efficiently.

title: AppWorks
description: 2010 年成立 AppWorks Accelerator，現為大東南亞地區最大的創業加速器，每半年嚴選 30 - 40 支本區域最具潛力 AI 與 Blockchain 新創進駐。輔導新創尋找 PMF、幫助成長期團隊建立 Highly Scalable Business Models。AppWorks 同時管理著三支風險投資基金，總規模達 2.12 億美元，投資組合中有 80 多家公司，包括區塊鏈領域新創公司：FLOW/Dapper Labs、Figment、Animoca Brands 和 Blocto...
description_en: Founded in 2010, AppWorks Accelerator is now the largest startup gas pedal in Southeast Asia with 30 - 40 of the region's most promising AI and Blockchain startups selected every six months. AppWorks also manages three venture capital funds with a combined size of $212 million and a portfolio of over 80 companies, including blockchain start-ups: FLOW/Dapper Labs, Figment The portfolio includes more than 80 companies, including blockchain start-ups FLOW/Dapper Labs, Figment, Animoca Brands, and Blocto…

title: SparkLabs
description: SparkLabs Taiwan 是一家專注於幫助台灣創業者走向世界的創業加速器。
description_en: SparkLabs Taiwan is a startup gas pedal focused on helping Taiwanese entrepreneurs go global.

title: TTA
description: TTA 是由國家科學技術委員會於 18 年推出的台灣旗艦創業生態系統建設計劃。我們的願景是在台灣建立一個充滿活力的國際創業生態系統。 我們通過連接技術、人才、市場和資本的平台來促進創業和創新。
description_en: TTA is the flagship entrepreneurial ecosystem-building program in Taiwan launched by the National Science and Technology Commission in FY18. Our vision is to build a vibrant international entrepreneurial ecosystem in Taiwan. We promote entrepreneurship and innovation through a platform that connects technology, talent, markets, and capital.

title: TonX Studio
description: TonX Studio 由早期的 TON 貢獻者組成，旨在協助 TON 上基礎設施的孵化與加速。
description_en: TonX Studio is composed of early TON contributors to help incubate and accelerate the infrastructure on TON.

title: AppWorks
description: 2010 年成立 AppWorks Accelerator，現為大東南亞地區最大的創業加速器，每半年嚴選 30 - 40 支本區域最具潛力 AI 與 Blockchain 新創進駐。輔導新創尋找 PMF、幫助成長期團隊建立 Highly Scalable Business Models。AppWorks 同時管理著三支風險投資基金，總規模達 2.12 億美元，投資組合中有 80 多家公司，包括區塊鏈領域新創公司：FLOW/Dapper Labs、Figment、Animoca Brands 和 Blocto...
description_en: Founded in 2010, AppWorks Accelerator is now the largest startup gas pedal in Southeast Asia with 30 - 40 of the region's most promising AI and Blockchain startups selected every six months. AppWorks also manages three venture capital funds with a combined size of $212 million and a portfolio of over 80 companies, including blockchain start-ups: FLOW/Dapper Labs, Figment The portfolio includes more than 80 companies, including blockchain start-ups FLOW/Dapper Labs, Figment, Animoca Brands, and Blocto…

title: Evernew Capital
description: Evernew Capital 成立於 2018 年，是一家投資基金，支持從種子到成長階段的加密公司和協議。我們專注於投資於人，提供實際支持和資金。
description_en: Founded in 2018, Evernew Capital is an investment fund that supports crypto companies and protocols from the seed to the growth stage. We focus on investing in people, providing hands-on support and capital.

title: Kyber Capital
description: Kyber Capital（源鉑資本）成立於 2015 年，為專注於去中心化金融技術、顛覆性金融服務、機器智能和網絡安全解決方案的高成長公司提供建議和風險投資。
description_en: Kyber Capital was founded in 2015 to provide advice and venture capital to high-growth companies focused on decentralized financial technologies, disruptive financial services, machine intelligence, and cybersecurity solutions.

title: Infinity Ventures
description: Infinity Ventures Crypto (IVC) 是一家僅投資於全球早期加密公司的加密風險基金。
description_en: Infinity Ventures Crypto (IVC) is a crypto venture fund that invests solely in early-stage global crypto companies.

title: Hive Venture
description: Hive Ventures 蜂行資本是專注於大數據、AI、Web 3的早期創投。三位創辦人曾聯合創立美國 NASDAQ 上市公司，並於 2019 年毅然決然歸國推動台灣軟體、大數據、AI、Web3 新創的全球化發展。
description_en: Hive Ventures is an early-stage venture capital firm focused on Big Data, AI, and Web 3. The three founders co-founded a NASDAQ-listed company in the US and decided to return to Taiwan in 2019 to promote the globalization of software, big data, AI, and Web3 innovations in Taiwan.

title: 紅樓資本
description: 紅樓資本是台灣第一個專注於區塊鏈前瞻技術與數位科技整合的風險投資公司，以Venture Studio的設定做賦能型風險投資，不只投入資金，更實際出力幫助新創公司在業務上的成長。
description_en: Red Building is the first venture capital firm in Taiwan to focus on the integration of blockchain forward-looking technology and digital technology.

title: Sora Ventures
description: Sora Ventures 是亞洲領先的致力於數位資產和區塊鏈投資的風險投資公司。該公司採用全新的風險投資模式，旨在擴展區塊鏈社區並幫助將區塊鏈項目轉變為商業世界。
description_en: Sora Ventures is Asia's leading venture capital firm dedicated to digital assets and blockchain investments. The firm employs a new venture capital model designed to expand the blockchain community and help transform blockchain projects into the business world.

title: Cherubic Ventures
description: 心元資本致力於成為全球下一個偉大企業的最早投資人。我們的核心理念是與敢夢的創業者們為伍，陪伴他們從創業的第一天開始，一起推動夢想成為改變世界的力量。
description_en: Cherubic Ventures is committed to being the earliest investor in the world's next great companies. Our core philosophy is to partner with entrepreneurs who dare to dream, to accompany them from day one, and to drive their dreams to become a world-changing force.

title: Outliers Fund
description: 通過科學研究和集體智慧支持由科學家主導的企業。
description_en: Supports scientist-led enterprises through scientific research and collective intelligence.

title: Lead Capital
description: 領先資本為專注於區塊鏈金融市場的風險投資公司，我們擁有獨創的整合技術、量化分析以及專業的市場研究。
description_en: Lead Capital is a venture capital firm focused on the blockchain financial market, with its original integrated technology, quantitative analysis, and specialized market research.

title: Gen3
description: Gen3 是專注於 Web3 產品的內容創作者、推廣者及社群平台，我們致力於找尋 Web3 新興產品或概念驗證、開拓對於 Web3 新技術的認知邊界，以及探索 Web3 能為世界帶來的真正價值。
description_en: Gen3 is a content creator, promoter, and community platform focused on Web3 products. We are dedicated to finding emerging Web3 products or proof of concepts, expanding the boundaries of knowledge about new Web3 technologies, and exploring the true value that Web3 can bring to the world.

title: Block2
description: 提供小型辦公室、共享空間、一樓設有活動場地租借，並引入區塊鏈相關技術產業，提供交流對話等活動資源，共同打造區塊鏈生態社區。
description_en: It provides small offices, shared spaces, and event venues for rent on the first floor, and introduces blockchain-related technology industries and provides resources for exchanges and dialogues and other activities to build a blockchain eco-community together.

title: 台北方舟 ARK
description: 為鼓勵臺灣區塊鏈產業發展，台北市會展產業發展基金會將原南港台電舊址倉庫活化為 N24 台北方舟 (ARK．TPE) 區塊鏈創新育成基地。不僅提供共創及展演空間等，並定期舉辦活動講座促進企業與國際團隊交流，結合產業供應鏈及場域實證空間，鼓勵與催化新創之間互助合作以提高創新和生產力，加速產業聚集蓬勃發展。
description_en: In order to encourage the development of Taiwan's blockchain industry, the Taipei Convention and Exhibition Industry Development Foundation (TCEIDF) has revitalized the former Nangang Taipower Warehouse into the N24 Taipei Ark (ARK.TPE) Blockchain Innovation and Incubation Base. It not only provides space for co-creation and exhibition, but also organizes regular activities and lectures to promote exchanges between enterprises and international teams, combines the industrial supply chain and the field demonstration space, encourages and catalyzes mutual cooperation among new innovations to improve innovation and productivity, and accelerates the development of industrial agglomeration and prosperity.

title: Blockmeet
description: 由動區動趨 BlockTempo 發起，凝聚起台灣區塊鏈及加密貨幣產業，結合線上平台與線下活動，提供社群一個分享交流的平台，推動最精準的區塊鏈新知與教育。
description_en: Started by BlockTempo, it aims to unite Taiwan's blockchain and cryptocurrency industries, combining online platforms and offline activities to provide the community with a platform for sharing and exchanging information, and to promote the most accurate new knowledge and education on blockchain.

title: Cypherpunks Taiwan
description: 「Cypherpunks Taiwan 密碼龐克」網站致力建立最具影響力的區塊鏈、比特幣、以太坊技術中文交流平台，掌握技術開發最新資訊，成為開發者、研究員的最佳利器。
description_en: "Cypherpunks Taiwan is dedicated to building the most influential Chinese language communication platform for blockchain, Bitcoin, and Ether technologies, mastering the latest information on technology development, and becoming the best tool for developers and researchers.

title: 台北比特幣聚會｜Taipei Bitcoin Meetup
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/DAO-社群生態/社群/台北比特幣聚會｜taipei-bitcoin-meetup.png
description: 台北比特幣聚會，專門為台北的比特幣愛好者而創立，舉辦、分享各種關於比特幣、區塊鏈的活動與知識。
description_en: Taipei Bitcoin Meetup, created specifically for Bitcoin enthusiasts in Taipei, organizes and shares various activities and knowledge about Bitcoin and blockchain.

title: Bitcoin 比特幣中文社團
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/DAO-社群生態/社群/bitcoin-比特幣中文社團.png
description: 一起討論、研究 Bitcoin 的社團，帶領社群即時追蹤 Bitcoin 發展進度，Facebook 上有近 16 萬名社團成員。
description_en: A community that discusses and researches Bitcoin together, and leads the community in tracking Bitcoin's development in real-time, with nearly 160,000 members on Facebook.

title: J Club
description: J club 是一群來自 2017 年的 Blockchain / DEFI / NFT / GAMEFI 團隊所打造的台灣加密社區。
description_en: J club is a Taiwanese crypto community created by a group of Blockchain / DEFI / NFT / GAMEFI teams from 2017.

title: Taipei Ethereum Meetup
description: Taipei Ethereum Meetup (TEM) 是一群有興趣了解更多關於以太坊區塊鏈技術的台灣工程師、企業家、區塊鏈愛好者、研究人員、學生組成。
description_en: Taipei Ethereum Meetup (TEM) is a group of Taiwanese engineers, entrepreneurs, blockchain enthusiasts, researchers, and students who are interested in learning more about Ethernet blockchain technology.

title: Alex 與交易的本質
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/DAO-社群生態/社群/alex-與交易的本質.png
description: 只在研究、討論交易分析技術指標的活躍社群
description_en: An active community that only researches and discusses technical indicators for trade analysis.

title: Bing‘s Defi Note
description: 專注研究、討論 DeFi 領域的活躍社群
description_en: Active community focused on researching and discussing the DeFi space.

title: JZ Invest
description: 曾在全球前 10 大加密貨幣機構管理數千萬美元，也待過傳統金融 3 大券商交易室，持有 CFA 美國特許金融分析師證照、BAYC #407，目前致力於分享加密貨幣投資理念，解析宏觀金融投資策略。
description_en: Having managed tens of millions of dollars in the world's top 10 cryptocurrency institutions, as well as having worked in the trading rooms of 3 major traditional financial brokerage firms, he holds a CFA CFA license, BAYC #407, and is currently dedicated to sharing cryptocurrency investment ideas and analyzing macro-financial investment strategies.

title: 2140 加密社群
description: 致力於推廣及維護健康發展的加密貨幣生態圈，提供訂閱制的會員服務。
description_en: Dedicated to promoting and maintaining the healthy development of the cryptocurrency ecosystem, we provide subscription-based membership services.

title: 工具王阿彰
description: 知名知識內容創作者、熱愛分享各領域實用資訊
description_en: Well-known knowledge content creator, passionate about sharing practical information in various fields.

title: DA 交易者聯盟
description: Do Alpha Trade Again！DA 交易者聯盟（DATA）是 DA Capital 旗下一品牌，由一群經驗豐富的職業交易員、美國頂尖商學院畢業生以及全球百大收益員共同創立。致力於為對投資、交易、區塊鏈及加密貨幣感興趣的人士提供一個系統化且易於理解的學習環境，並通過專業的指導和資源分享，DA 交易者聯盟幫助用戶提高投資視野，並在金融市場中取得豐碩的成果。
description_en: DA Traders Alliance (DATA), a brand of DA Capital, was founded by a group of experienced professional traders, graduates of top US business schools, and top 100 global revenue earners. Dedicated to providing a systematic and easy-to-understand learning environment for people interested in investing, trading, blockchain and cryptocurrencies, and through professional guidance and resource sharing, DA Traders Alliance helps users to improve their investment horizons and achieve impactful results in the financial markets.

title: 腦哥の幣圈投資小圈圈
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/DAO-社群生態/社群/腦哥の幣圈投資小圈圈.png
description: 由台灣知名加密貨幣領域 YouTuber 腦哥營運的官方社群，歡迎大家一起來交流幣圈新知 / 消息。
description_en: The official community run by Taiwan's leading cryptocurrency YouTuber, Brain Bro, welcomes you to exchange new knowledge/news in the cryptocurrency world.
id: 腦哥の幣圈投資小圈圈

title: 古亭區塊鏈遊戲公會
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/DAO-社群生態/社群/古亭區塊鏈遊戲公會.png
description: 古亭區塊鏈遊戲公會致力於區塊鏈遊戲議題，挖掘高潛力發展項目，帶領公會成員跨越區塊鏈門檻，提供珍貴的先驅研究與實戰經驗值，加入公會Discord一起探索區塊鏈元宇宙
description_en: The Gutin Blockchain Gaming community is dedicated to blockchain gaming issues, exploring high-potential development projects, leading guild members to cross the blockchain threshold, and providing valuable pioneering research and real-world combat experience, join the guild Discord to explore the blockchain meta-universe together!

title: CryptoPaul 幣圈保羅
description: 致力於推廣幣圈全方位投資，專研加密貨幣交易、找尋鏈上投資機會，建立新手友善，老手也適合的學習交流社群。
description_en: Dedicated to promoting all-around investment in the cryptocurrency circle, specializing in cryptocurrency trading, looking for investment opportunities on the chain, and establishing a learning and exchange community that is friendly to newbies and suitable for veterans.

title: 0x0
description: 0x0 是一家提供全方位服務的音樂廠牌、製作公司和管理公司，由一群熱愛音樂的未來主義者和 0x0 DAO 成員經營。
description_en: 0x0 is a music label, production company and management company that provides all services and is run by a group of music-loving futurists and 0x0 DAO members.

title: 呢喃貓投資
description: 呢喃貓投資由幾位具有法人投資經歷的交易員組成，專注於加密貨幣投資研究，成員包含美國私募基金分析師、傳統股票基金操盤人及全職加密貨幣投資人等。
description_en: MurMurCats Investments is comprised of several traders with corporate investment experience, specializing in cryptocurrency investment research, including U.S. private equity analysts, traditional stock fund traders, and full-time cryptocurrency investors.

title: 虛擬通貨流動吧 X CryptoBar
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/DAO-社群生態/社群/虛擬通貨流動吧-x-cryptobar.png
description: 討論範圍 Crytpo 和金融：新知、新聞、技術、法規、奇技淫巧、有趣事物
description_en: Discusses Crypto and Finance: new knowledge, news, technology, regulations, gizmos, interesting things

title: Buckchaf
description: CBA 亞洲區塊鏈學院致力於推動完整區塊鏈培訓課程，紮實訓練成為頂尖「區塊鏈商業應用規劃師」與「區塊鏈技術專家」。
description_en: CBA Asia Blockchain Academy is committed to promoting a complete blockchain training program and providing solid training to become a top "blockchain business application planner" and "blockchain technical expert".

title: 龜Talk
description: 一個適合任何年紀收聽的幣圈投資節目,創辦人為傳統銀行MA 並為台大商研畢業, 以各種金融焦度探討幣圈的投資

title: Lion DAO
description: Lion DAO 成員 95% 以上為企業 CEO 或高層管理人員，橫跨數位與傳統產業。
description_en: More than 95% of Lion DAO members are CEOs or senior executives of corporations, spanning both digital and traditional industries.

title: Ape 101 Taiwan Club
description: 由一群 BAYC 持有者組成，旨在為台灣提供更廣泛、公平的 NFT 資訊空間，因志同道合而聚集、產生的組織。
description_en: An organization formed by a group of BAYC holders, aiming to provide a broader and fairer NFT information space in Taiwan, gathered and generated by like-minded people.

title: Bu Zhi DAO
description: BZD 是一個由企業創辦人、建設者和投資者組成的 DAO，熱衷於推進台灣的 web3 生態系統和文化。
description_en: BZD is a DAO comprised of business founders, builders, and investors who are passionate about advancing the web3 ecosystem and culture in Taiwan.

title: Sweeper DAO
description: SweeperDAO 是一個由社區領導的去中心化自治組織，透過銷毀劣質 NFT 項目，可以換取 $SWEEP 代幣，以獨特的經營模式來推動大家 NFT 的發展與討論。
description_en: SweeperDAO is a community-led, decentralized, autonomous organization that promotes the development and discussion of everyone's NFTs with a unique business model by destroying poor quality NFT items that can be exchanged for $SWEEP tokens.

title: EM3DAO
description: 我們是一個充滿活力的加密貨幣愛好者、研究人員和區塊鏈開發者社群。
description_en: We are a vibrant community of cryptocurrency enthusiasts, researchers and blockchain developers.

title: FAB DAO
description: FAB DAO，全名 Formosa Art Bank DAO，為公益 NFT 自治組織，由發起人黃豆泥、吳哲宇啟動台灣最大公益 NFT 募資專案「百岳計畫 Project % 」，集結跨域組織與個人，開創臺灣 NFT 結合公益、藝術、文化的新篇章。
description_en: Formosa Art Bank DAO, is a public welfare NFT autonomous organization. The founders, Huang Dou Nai and Wu Zhe Yu, initiated the largest public welfare NFT fund-raising project in Taiwan, "Project %", to gather cross-domain organizations and individuals, and to open up a new chapter of Taiwan's NFT, combining public welfare, art, and culture.

title: Volume DAO
description: VolumeDAO 眾聲道，成立於 2021 年底，由藏家、藝術家、策展人、評論人和行動主義者組成，並以 Tezos 鏈為基地，積極推動區塊鏈及人工智慧藝術，希望和創作者及藏家共創 Web3.0 時代的藝術生態系。
description_en: Volume DAO, founded in the end of 2021, consists of collectors, artists, curators, critics and activists, and is based on the Tezos chain, actively promoting blockchain and artificial intelligence art, in the hope of creating an art ecosystem in the Web 3.0 era with creators and collectors.

title: ＭatrixDAO
description: MatrixDAO 是採取扁平式治理與協作模式運營的 Venture DAO，希望以協作型社群的形式共同研究、做投資決策，以協作方式找到優良投資標的。
description_en: MatrixDAO is a Venture DAO that operates under a flat governance and collaboration model, hoping to find good investment targets through collaborative research and investment decision-making in the form of a community.

title: PleasrDAO
description: PleasrDAO 是由 DeFi 領袖、早期 NFT 收藏家及數位藝術家組成的去中心化自治組織，主要透過以慈善的方式收購有文化意義或是網路歷史片段的藝術作品 (主要以 NFT 為主)。
description_en: PleasrDAO is a decentralized, self-governing organization of DeFi leaders, early NFT collectors, and digital artists that acquires culturally significant artworks and pieces of internet history (primarily NFT) on a charitable basis.

title: TazhiDAO
description: 一個由女性主導的亞洲社群，旨在提供一個安全、多元且包容的空間，塑造理想的 Web3 未來，促進積極變革。
description_en: A female-led Asian community that aims to provide a safe, diverse and inclusive space to shape the ideal Web3 future and promote positive change.

group: 政府 / 利益團體-政府部門
title: 工研院
