logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/政府-利益團體/政府部門/工研院.png
description: 工業技術研究院是台灣國際級的應用研究機構，擁有數千位研發尖兵，以科技研發，帶動產業發展，創造經濟價值，增進社會福祉為任務。
description_en: The Industrial Technology Research Institute (ITRI) is a world-class applied research institute in Taiwan, with thousands of R&D professionals, whose mission is to drive industrial development, create economic value, and enhance social welfare through scientific and technological research.

group: 政府 / 利益團體-政府部門
title: 資策會
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/政府-利益團體/政府部門/資策會.png
description: 策進中華民國資通訊科技之創新與應用，協助發展數位經濟為宗旨。
description_en: The mission is to promote the innovation and application of information and communication technology in the Republic of China and to help develop the digital economy.

group: 政府 / 利益團體-政府部門
title: 數發部
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/政府-利益團體/政府部門/數發部.png
description: 數發部主要職掌為促進全國通訊、資訊、資通安全、網路與傳播等數位產業發展、統籌數位治理與數位基礎建設，並促進數位經濟發展及加速國家數位轉型。
description_en: Moda is responsible for promoting the development of digital industries such as communications, information, information security, networks and communications, coordinating digital governance and digital infrastructure, and promoting the development of the digital economy and accelerating the digital transformation of the country.

group: 政府 / 利益團體-利益團體
title: 台灣區塊鏈大學聯盟
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/政府-利益團體/利益團體/台灣區塊鏈大學聯盟.png
description: 台灣區塊鏈大學聯盟連結 30 幾所院校區塊鏈社團及聯盟組織，提供學生多方向資源，如職涯規劃、知識教育及幹部訓練等，共同研究區塊鏈技術、原理與應用，及鏈結各領域科技。
description_en: Taiwan Blockchain Academia links more than 30 blockchain societies and consortium organizations to provide students with resources in various directions, such as career planning, knowledge education and cadre training, to jointly study blockchain technologies, principles and applications, and to link technologies in various fields.

group: 政府 / 利益團體-利益團體
title: 台灣區塊鏈大聯盟
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/政府-利益團體/利益團體/台灣區塊鏈大聯盟.png
description: 由國內產官學研各界共同成立的「臺灣區塊鏈大聯盟」，旨在建立溝通平台使業界與政府雙向資訊交流，進行國內外合作，推動場域應用，促進人才培育，創造業者良好的發展環境。
description_en: Taiwan Blockchain Alliance was jointly established by domestic industry, government, academia, and research institutes. Aiming to establish a communication platform for two-way information exchange between the industry and the government, to conduct domestic and international cooperation, to promote the application of the field, to facilitate the cultivation of talents, and to create a favorable development environment for the industry.

group: 政府 / 利益團體-利益團體
title: 台灣NFT協會（NADA）
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/政府-利益團體/利益團體/台灣nft協會（nada）.png
description: 台灣 NFT 協會是由台灣數間 NFT 應用相關公司作為核心成員，涵蓋 NFT 發行、交易、行銷、商業應用、遊戲、創作、藝術、音樂等多元領域等業者所組成，以推廣 NFT 產業應用、技術發展及加速產業普及為宗旨，致力推動 Web2 產業升級與 Web3 連結，期許帶動不同產業的資源共享整合，協助台灣 NFT 生態圈和全世界接軌。
description_en: The Taiwanese NFT Association is composed of several NFT application-related companies in Taiwan as core members, covering NFT distribution, trading, marketing, commercial applications, games, creativity, art, music, and other diversified fields, etc. The association aims to promote NFT industry applications, technology development, and accelerate the popularity of the industry. NADA is committed to promote the upgrading of the Web2 industry and Web3 linkage, hoping to promote the sharing of resources in different industries, and meanwhile assisting Taiwan's NFT ecosystem to connect with the world.

group: 政府 / 利益團體-利益團體
title: 臺灣區塊鏈愛好者協會
title_en: Taiwan Association For Blockchain Ecosystem Innovation
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/政府-利益團體/利益團體/臺灣區塊鏈愛好者協會.png
description: 臺灣區塊鏈愛好者年會歷年皆由行政院科技會報辦公室的指導，以提升民眾對區塊鏈認知理解，以及協助公部門、企業釐清合適的區塊鏈應用導入場景為使命。
description_en: Taiwan Association For Blockchain Ecosystem Innovation’s Annual Conference has been guided by the Technology Reporting Office of the Executive Yuan, with the mission of enhancing public awareness and understanding of blockchain, and helping public departments and enterprises to identify suitable blockchain applications for introduction into the market.
id: 臺灣區塊鏈愛好者協會

group: 政府 / 利益團體-利益團體
title: 比特幣及虛擬通貨發展協會
title_en: Bitcoin and Crypto Currency Development Association
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/政府-利益團體/利益團體/比特幣及虛擬通貨發展協會.png
description: 比特幣及虛擬通貨發展協會以推動虛擬通貨有關之法規調適、虛擬通貨之應用及發展為宗旨，協助臺灣建立良好健全之虛擬通貨業環境、促進相關產業及整體經濟向上發展。
description_en: Bitcoin and Crypto Currency Development Association aims to promote the regulation of virtual currency, the application and development of virtual currency, to help establish a sound virtual currency industry environment in Taiwan, and to promote the upward development of related industries and the overall economy.
id: 比特幣及虛擬通貨發展協會

group: 政府 / 利益團體-利益團體
title: 台灣虛擬通貨反洗錢協會
title_en: Taiwan Virtual Asset Anti-Money Laundering Association
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/政府-利益團體/利益團體/台灣虛擬通貨反洗錢協會.png
description: 集合具備虛擬通貨反洗錢專業知識之相關人員，透由研究國內外虛擬通貨反洗錢之指引、法規、制度彙整後，以舉辦研討會及教育講座之形式，教育引導市場及虛擬通貨從業人業，得以具備正確之洗錢防制及打擊資恐觀念。
description_en: By gathering relevant personnel with expertise in anti-money laundering of virtual commodities, we will organize seminars and educational talks to educate and guide the market and the virtual commodities industry to have the correct concept of money laundering prevention and anti-money laundering by studying the guidelines, regulations and systems of virtual commodities in China and abroad.
id: 台灣虛擬通貨反洗錢協會

group: 政府 / 利益團體-利益團體
title: 臺灣金融科技協會
logo_banner: https://image.blocktempo.com/ecomap/政府-利益團體/利益團體/臺灣金融科技協會.png
description: 臺灣金融科技協會號召有志之士，包括金融機構、金融科技創新人才、金融科技新創公司、資訊業界、政界、學界、研究機構等，激發跳躍式創新及共享共創合作之良性競爭，協助金融機構轉型，激勵提升台灣金融科技產業的國際競爭力與能量。
description_en: Taiwan FinTech Association calls on all interested parties, including financial institutions, financial technology innovators, financial technology start-ups, the information industry, political circles, academia, and research institutions, to stimulate jump-start innovation and healthy competition for sharing and co-creation, to assist financial institutions in their transformation, and to stimulate the enhancement of the international competitiveness and energy of Taiwan's financial technology industry.

title: Ambrus Studio
description: Ambrus Studio 是一個 Web3.0的戰略角色扮演遊戲，結合 MOBA 和沙盒形式的電子競技手遊。
description_en: Ambrus Studio is a Web 3.0 strategy role-playing game that combines MOBA and sandbox forms of e-competitive handheld games.

title: FITzOn
description: FITzOn 是一款以 Move-to-earn 為基底、NFT 服裝為背後經濟體系，所發展出的一款獨眾健身 APP。以此為用戶優化在 Web3 的世界中結合行動（Active）與社交（Social lifestyle）的體驗。
description_en: FITzOn is a unique fitness app developed with Move-to-earn as the base and NFT clothing as the backbone of the economy, optimizing the experience of combining active and social lifestyles in the Web3 world for users.

title: Metatheory
description: Metatheory 是一家互動技術和娛樂公司，致力於構建 Web3 遊戲、互動內容、社交體驗和其他社區驅動的冒險活動。Metatheory 的使命是通過建立在跨代 IP 上的沉浸式世界將世界各地的人們聯繫起來，從而激發想像力。
description_en: Metatheory is an interactive technology and entertainment company dedicated to building Web3 games, interactive content, social experiences and other community-driven adventures. Metatheory's mission is to inspire imagination by connecting people around the world through immersive worlds built on cross-generational IP.

title: Genopets
description: Genopets 是一款 move-to-earn 遊戲，它將社交健身激勵、免費遊戲機制和玩家控制的 Web-3 經濟相結合。
description_en: Genopets is a move-to-earn game that combines social fitness motivation, free-to-play mechanics, and a player-controlled Web-3 economy.

title: Zoofrenz
description: Zoofrenz 是由台灣遊戲美術團隊 Zombot Studio 打造，目標是要建構一個凝聚各種 Zoofrenz 動物的多元宇宙。首波已發行 6666 隻的 Apefrenz，持有者除了 2D 圖像的 NFT 之外，還能夠再獲得 Zoofrenz NFT 對應的 3D 頭像。
description_en: Zoofrenz is created by Zombot Studio, a Taiwanese game art team, with the goal of building a multiverse that unites all kinds of Zoofrenz animals. The first wave of 6,666 Apefrenz have been released, and owners will be able to get a 3D avatar corresponding to the Zoofrenz NFT in addition to the 2D image of the NFT.

title: Petarush
description: PetaRush 是一款以 NFT 角色為主的賽跑遊戲，跑者以獅子、貓咪、鴿子、狐狸等賽博龐克的風格形象呈現，並融入了其他項目的 IP。競賽地點則是在充滿科幻風的火星場景，星球上的沙丘、亞湖、火山等地形，在賽道上都有精緻的呈現。
description_en: PetaRush is a race game based on NFT characters, with runners presented in the style of lions, cats, doves, foxes and other cyberpunk images, and incorporating IP from other events, while the race takes place on a sci-fi-inspired Martian landscape, with the planet's sand dunes, sub lakes, volcanoes and other terrains all exquisitely presented on the course.
